translation.en: [man] Breakfast!
Charlie, you're gonna be late, mate.
I'm cereal.
I'm pancakes.
Toast with jam, no butter.
Toast and marmalade.
Okay. Toast with, uh, jam, that's there.
-And one cereal. -[girl] Dad!
-Buster. Buster, what… What's that? -Lolly.
translation.zh:
‎-巴斯特 那是什么？
‎-棒棒糖

translation.en: -We don't have lollies for breakfast. -Why?
translation.zh:
‎我们早餐不吃棒棒糖 对吧？ ‎-为什么？
‎-为什么？

translation.en: Why? Because I have made you some lovely bacon.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-为什么？ ‎因为我给你做了美味的培根

translation.en: Well, I'm vegan now.
Course you are.
Lunch box, lunch box.
No. Guys. No. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎不 各位 不 抱歉

translation.en: What've we said? We don't have hamsters at the dinner table, do we? Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎我们怎么说的？
‎不把仓鼠带上餐桌 是吧？谢谢

translation.en: All right, thank you.
We've got about ten minutes left.
I need you to get your coats, your school bags, and let's go.

translation.en: Quick! [claps]
Guys, we're gonna be late!
Charlie, thank you.
Rosie, don't forget your sandwich. That's yours. Buster, come here.

translation.en: Look, just stay there. Put your arm through there.
Doesn't matter. Go. Here, take your hat.
translation.zh: ‎算了 去吧 给 帽子拿着！

translation.en: Buster, come… Where's your shoe?
Buster! It doesn't matter. Go, quick.
It's here! I've got it. I've got the shoe.
-Ah, Mr. Cunningham. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰先生 ‎-是
‎-这是您的包裹

translation.en: -I've got a parcel for you. -Oh, thank you.
-Sorry, I need you to sign. -I don't have a pen.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 我需要你签字
‎-我没有笔

translation.en: -I have a pencil. -Ah, no, can't use pencil.
translation.zh: ‎我有铅笔 ‎不行 不能用铅笔

translation.en: -I've got a crayon. -No, crayon's too waxy. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-我有蜡笔
‎-不行 蜡笔太蜡了 抱歉

translation.en: -A felt-tip. -Gotta be black Biro.
translation.zh:
‎-我有签字笔
‎-必须是黑色圆珠笔

translation.en: -I don't have a black Biro. -I have.
You can use that. You only had to ask. That's it, and we just need the date
translation.zh: ‎你可以用这个 你问就行了 ‎好了 还需要日期…

translation.en: of your birth.
-Okay. -Lovely.
Oh, and we got to do a photo for proof of delivery.
translation.zh: ‎还得拍张照片 证明送达

translation.en: Okay, kids. Here we go.
That's it, kids. Nice big smile.
translation.zh: ‎好 孩子们 美美地笑

translation.en: And we're done.
Lovely. Think you're gonna enjoy that. And you, kids.
translation.zh:
‎很好 我想你会喜欢的
‎你们也是 孩子们

translation.en: Haven't read it though, haven't read it.
All right, listen, everyone get in the car. Thank you.

translation.en: Rosie, will you get the door, please?
Dad, you forgot the costume for the Christmas concert!

translation.en: I need a cake for the Christmas bake!
You said you would do the reading with me.
Don't your teachers do the reading?
-I feel all wobbly. -Off you go.
-Quick as you can. Love you! Bye! -[kids] Love you. Bye!
Ooh, sorry. Morning, children.
translation.zh:
‎早上好 抱歉 ‎-早上好 孩子们 又迟到了
‎-你好 再见！好谢谢

translation.en: -Late again. -Hello. Bye-bye! Okay, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-早上好 孩子们 又迟到了
‎-你好 再见！好谢谢

translation.en: No!
Not acceptable!
So time is of the essence, people. I need loyalty.
translation.zh: ‎时间很重要 各位 ‎我需要忠诚

translation.en: I need people with no distractions. I need commitment.
translation.zh: ‎我需要完全专注的人 我需要投入

translation.en: I need 110% commitment.
-How much commitment do I need? -110% commitment.
Oh, welcome! Thank you for joining us. Do take a seat.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎 谢谢你加入我们 坐吧

translation.en: Sorry, it was the school run. You know kids.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 送孩子去学校
‎你知道孩子什么样

translation.en: [laughs] Really, was it? I don't care.
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？我不在乎 我是做生意的

translation.en: I'm running a business, and in business, kids don't count!
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？我不在乎 我是做生意的 ‎在生意里 孩子不重要

translation.en: Now, where was I?
The Emblem deal needs to be done by the end of the year.
translation.zh: ‎恩布勒姆交易 必须在今年底前完成

translation.en: We want our pitch to outpitch every other pitch out there. Woo!
translation.zh: ‎我们的推介 要胜过其他所有推介

translation.en: Cunningham. People seem to think you have a certain charm.
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰 ‎大家似乎都觉得你有魅力

translation.en: Therefore, you will present the final pitch.
translation.zh: ‎因此 由你来做最后的推介

translation.en: Wait, sorry. When exactly do you think that I would be pitching?
translation.zh:
‎等等 抱歉
‎你设想我什么时候进行推介？

translation.en: I get very busy with the run-up to Christmas with kids and…
translation.zh:
‎圣诞节之前 我总是很忙
‎因为孩子们…

translation.en: 24th December.
Twenty… But that's Christmas Eve!
You had better prioritize, then. Your job or Santa coming down the chimney.
translation.zh: ‎那你最好想清楚轻重缓急了 ‎你的工作 还是圣诞老人爬烟囱

translation.en: Right. Class dismissed.
Cunningham.
I can't stress to you how important this account is for us.
translation.zh: ‎我无法强调这个客户对我们有多重要

translation.en: Jobs are on the line.
Your job.
Okay, I know, and I won't let you down. I promise I'll make it work.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我不会让你失望的
‎我保证我能办妥

translation.en: Is that a hamster?
Yes. That's my son's lunch box. Buster. Always forgets his sandwiches.
translation.zh:
‎对 那是我儿子巴斯特的午餐盒
‎他总落下他的三明治

translation.en: Ham sandwich, hamster sandwich. You know what kids are like.
translation.zh:
‎火腿三明治 仓鼠三明治
‎你知道小孩子什么样

translation.en: No, I don't, because in business, kids don't count.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不知道 因为在生意上
‎孩子不重要

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. We can do the pitch.
We can do it. We'll make it work. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以的 我们能做到

translation.en: Come on, then.
There you go. You'll be safe in there.
-[exhales] -Hey, Matty.
-What's that? -A letter from a lawyer, I think.
Boy! What you done now, bro? [chuckles]
I've been left a… gift or an inheritance.
Who from?
-That's odd. It's from my dad. -Your dad?
translation.zh:
‎-奇怪 是我爸送的
‎-你爸爸？

translation.en: No, it's fine. I didn't really know him, to be honest.
translation.zh: ‎不 没关系 我其实并不了解他

translation.en: "Dear, Mr. Cunningham, I've been instructed by your father
translation.zh:
‎“亲爱的坎宁翰先生
‎我受你父亲的指示

translation.en: to give you this letter containing the keys to…"
translation.zh: ‎寄给你这封信 内含钥匙 是用来…”

translation.en: -"Please visit this website." -Visit the website! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-“请登录此网站”
‎-快登录那个网站啊！

translation.en: "Mistletoe…"
Is that yours… to keep?
[Matt] I don't know.
Yo, that looks like it's worth a fortune, you know?

translation.en: I can't deal with this right now. We've got so much work to do.

‎我现在没法应付这事
‎我们有那么工作呢

translation.en: Hey. Wait a minute, man.
This is exactly what you need to nail the pitch.

translation.en: Peace and quiet in the countryside.
Just you and the rolling hills. No distractions.

translation.en: No more Cruella de Vil Fletcher on your back.

translation.en: Just you and hamster, and the lovely, friendly countryfolk.

translation.en: It's a win.
It's a win-win.
Triple win, bro.
You see it, yeah?
Yeah, you see it.
-Are you okay, Daddy? -Yeah, I'm fine.
-Have you brushed your teeth? -Yeah.
-What are you looking at? -[Buster] It's a farm, silly.

‎-你在看什么？
‎-这是个农场 傻瓜

translation.en: -Where is the farm? -It's in a place called Cobbledon.

‎-这农场在哪里？
‎-在一个叫柯布顿的地方

translation.en: Can we go to the farm, Dad?
Are there animals there?
Yeah, like Fleece.
-Please can we go to the farm? -Yeah, please?
-Please! -For Christmas.
We can't go for Christmas.
How will Santa know where to deliver all your presents?

‎不然圣诞老人怎么知道
‎把你们礼物送哪里？

translation.en: Mum would let us.
[Matt] The thing is, Mummy isn't here anymore.

translation.zh: ‎但你说妈妈永远跟我们在一起

translation.en: -You said she was always in our hearts. -Yeah, you say that every day.

‎-你说她永远在我们心里
‎-对 你每天都这么说

translation.en: No, and she is. She is in our hearts.
It's just Mummy can't make the decisions anymore.
That has to be Daddy's job.
Well, hang on, no, 'cause… Oh, wait a minute. She's coming in.
She's coming through, and she's saying that she still is the boss of me,

translation.en: and we should go to the farm.
[kids] Yeah!
But first I have to clear it with the school.

Mr. Cunningham, how can we be sure

translation.en: that they will provide an adequate education?
It can't be any worse than here! [laughs]
I am seeing quite dysfunctional behavior in all five of your children.

translation.en: You know, Rosie is…
She's really not herself. She's very quiet.

translation.en: I could be forgiven for thinking that sometimes she is asleep in my lesson.

‎查理总踢其他男生和女生
‎还写下了脏话

translation.en: I understand that you've been through a difficult situation,

translation.en: but I fear that they are falling behind in their work.

translation.en: Well, don't be too hard on yourself about that,

translation.en: because I know that if you work really hard,

translation.en: find your mojo, next year, these kids, they're gonna excel.

translation.en: So thank you. And Merry Christmas!
Wetsuit? Okay. Fine.
[exhales] Are you absolutely sure about this?
What if you get there and this farm doesn't exist?

‎如果你去了
‎这个农场根本不存在呢？ ‎那我就转身直接回来

translation.en: -I will turn around and come back. -Just manage your expectations, won't you?

translation.en: Your dad was full of secrets and surprises. Not all of them good.

Drive carefully.
-[Matt] Bye, Mum. -Bye! Have a lovely time!

‎-再见 妈
‎-再见 孩子 ‎-再见！玩得开心！
‎-再见奶奶

[Rosie] It's so cool!

‎-你开过了刚刚的牌子

translation.en: It's the countryside.
Vehicles give way to animals in the countryside.
Have you read the signs?
Okay, fine. Is the horse okay?
Yes. No thanks to you.
So much for the friendly countryfolk!
[Matt] I think this is it.
Here we go.
[Rosie] It says Mistletoe Farm right there.
[Matt] We have arrived.
[Buster] Whoa! Look at that!
[Violet] It's so cute!
Is it our farm, Dad?

translation.en: -[Matt] I think so. -Look, Dad! More baa-sheep!

translation.en: -No, it's not baa-sheep. It's just sheep. -Sheep poo!

Okay.
What is that smell?
-I think it's you, Buster. -It's not me!
-Well, someone likes eggs. -I think I know why, Daddy.

‎-某人好喜欢吃鸡蛋
‎-我想我知道原因了 爸爸

translation.en: -It's so cute. Can we keep it? -No, we can't keep it. Come here.

‎-好可爱 我们可以留着吗？
‎-不 不能留着 ‎过来

translation.en: Listen, don't panic. That's it. We're fine. We'll take it… Oh God! No!

‎听着 别慌 就这样
‎没事了 我们把它…天啊！不！

translation.en: No, be careful! Don't… don't pick it up.
Don't pick… Okay. Well, just be… Okay. Take it outside.

‎别…好吧 你抱了
‎小心点 好 把它抱出去

translation.en: Okay, don't let… Be careful. Don't let it…
translation.zh: ‎好 别让…小心点 别让它…

translation.en: -That's really good. -What are these, Dad?
[Matt] Some, uh, biscuits.
"From Barry the baker." Who's Barry the baker?
translation.zh:
‎“来自烘焙师巴里”
‎谁是烘焙师巴里？

translation.en: -I don't know. -I don't know.
I want this room!
I want it! I love it!
Let's go!
-Whoa, this room is awesome! -I want this bed.
translation.zh:
‎-这个房间太棒了！
‎-我要这张床

translation.en: Where'd they go?
Guys, we can sort bedrooms later. First things first, let's find a kettle.

‎各位 我们待会儿再分卧室
‎首先 我们要找到水壶

translation.en: You have got to be kidding me!
-[bleating] -Oh! Hello! [clears throat]
Hello, Mr.… Mr. Goat.
Kids, careful. Come round there.

translation.en: Hello. What… Right.
Okay, straight out there. Off you go. That's it. Go on.

translation.en: Out the door!
The goat has gone.
Rosie, would you look after everybody, and I will be back in a moment?
translation.zh:
‎萝茜 你能照顾下大家吗？
‎我马上回来

translation.en: Water. Water.
Hang on!
Hang… Hello?
-Hey! How goes it, farmer? [laughs] -[Matt] How goes it?
Not great, to be honest, Mo. I'm sat in a stream,
translation.zh:
‎说实话 不太好 莫
‎我正坐在小溪里

translation.en: trying to get water for a cup of tea.
Yeah. Boo-hoo and all of that, yeah.
Matty, I've got some news, right?
Banda House are pitching
for the Emblem account also.
Banda House? Everything they pitch for, they end up winning!
That's why we really need you to nail this, Matty.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们才需要你搞定此事
‎马特 好吗？

translation.en: For all of our sakes. None of us wanna lose our jobs before Christmas.

‎为了我们所有人
‎我们都不想在圣诞节前丢掉工作

translation.en: -We're really relying on you, bro. -What's that, Mo?
translation.zh:
‎-我们真靠你了 兄弟
‎-你说什么 莫？

translation.en: Yeah. Hello?
Mo, I can't hear you.
Yo, he's smashing it, you know?
I'm not worried at all!
Okay, guys, let's take these upstairs.

translation.en: Be careful. We don't wanna set fire to the farmhouse tonight.

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow if there's insurance.
translation.zh: ‎有保险的话 也许明天烧吧

translation.en: Are we really gonna spend Christmas on the farm, Dad?

translation.en: -I like the moo-cows. -[chuckles] Yeah, I like the moo-cows too.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢哞哞牛
‎-我也喜欢哞哞牛

translation.en: Although we just call them…
cows.
[Matt] You looking for Mum?
Do you think she likes it here, Dad?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得她喜欢这里吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Well, that depends.
Which one do you think she is?
That really twinkly one. See it?
translation.zh: ‎那个闪闪发光的 看到了吗？

translation.en: [Matt] Yes.
That one's sparkling.
-Wow. That one's shining. -That one has to be Mum.
translation.zh: ‎哇 那个好亮 ‎那个一定是妈妈

translation.en: -So beautiful. -Look at that shooting star over there.
-[kids] Whoa! -Everybody make a wish.
And then back to bed.
Whose wellies are they, Dad?
Well, I think they were my daddy's, but I'm not sure.
translation.zh: ‎可能是我爸的 但我不确定

translation.en: How come you don't know much about your dad?
Because my daddy was very busy,
and I didn't see him much at all when I was growing up,
and then we lost contact.
I don't want to lose contact with you.
That will never ever happen, okay?
-Never. -[kids yell]
[Matt] Oh, God! You've broke the bed!
-[Matt] Kids, come in. Be careful. -Yay! The goat's back!
translation.zh:
‎-孩子们 进来 小心点
‎-山羊回来了！

translation.en: -[Lily] Yay! -Buster.
What've we said about lollipops for breakfast, okay? Buster.
translation.zh:
‎我们不是说早餐不吃棒棒糖吗？
‎巴斯特

translation.en: Hey! He took my lolly!
Ugh, Buster!
It's not me!
-It is not Buster, okay? The eggs are bad. -Maybe the chicken laid an egg.
translation.zh: ‎不是巴斯特 好吗？鸡蛋坏了 ‎也许鸡下蛋了

translation.en: Let's go and see!
-And there is no Wi-Fi. There is no Wi-Fi! -Daddy, why are you shouting?
translation.zh:
‎还没有无线网络 ‎-没有无线网络！
‎-爸爸你在喊什么？

translation.en: Because there's no Wi-Fi!
-Any eggs? -We looked under every single chicken.
translation.zh:
‎-有鸡蛋吗？
‎-我们每只鸡都翻了

translation.en: No eggs. Nothing.
-Thought there were gonna be more animals. -Yeah, maybe even like a baby Fleece.
translation.zh:
‎-我以为会有更多的动物
‎-对 甚至有小羊毛毛

translation.en: -[Rosie] What was that? Come on! -[Violet] Let's go see!
translation.zh: ‎那是什么？来吧！ ‎来吧 我们去看看！

translation.en: Tiny pony!
-[Lily] Real-life donkey. -[Buster] And a baby cow.
And a baby Fleece.
-Quick, hurry up, let's go. -[kid] Run!
It's an ogre.
Who said that? Come out and show yourselves.
How did you get in?
Through the door.
Oh, very clever. [grunts]
Oh, who are you?
-Well, do you have names? -Everyone has names, don't they?

translation.en: Not necessarily, no. See that donkey?
translation.zh: ‎不一定 看到那头驴了吗？

translation.en: That's donkey number one, and that one is donkey number two.
translation.zh: ‎那是一号驴 那一头是二号驴

translation.en: -Why don't you name them? -Because I forgot to do it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎为什么不给它们取名？ ‎因为我忘了 好吗？

translation.en: What are your names?
I'm Violet.
I'm Rosie, the oldest.
-I'm Buster. -And I'm Lily, Charlie's twin.
translation.zh:
‎-我是巴斯特
‎-我是莉莉 查理的双胞胎

translation.en: You don't look like twins.
[both] Because we're non-identical twins.
Right, okay, so what are you non-identicals doing on my farm?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 你们这对异卵双胞胎
‎在我的农场做什么？

translation.en: -Our dad won it in a Willy Wonka thing. -What is a--
translation.zh:
‎-我们爸爸中大奖赢下了农场
‎-什么…

translation.en: He means a will. Dad got it from his father's will.
translation.zh:
‎他是说遗嘱
‎爸爸是靠他父亲遗嘱得到的

translation.en: So you're the new owners?
Oh my God! Well, why didn't you say? [laughs]
Hello! Uh, I am Beano.
Farmhand slash animal wrangler slash professional poo-picker-upper.
translation.zh: ‎农场工人兼牧马人兼职业挑粪工

translation.en: Hashtag Beano at your service.
Pleased to meet you, guys.
-Do you wanna meet the animals? -[kids] Yes!
[Beano] Yes, you do!
Then walk this way.
So this is my man pig, Arnie,
named after his favorite actor, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.zh:
‎以他最喜欢的演员
‎阿诺德施瓦辛格命名的

translation.en: "I'll be back… bacon."
No? Okay, and this beautiful, beautiful soul here is Potter.
translation.zh: ‎不懂吗？好吧 这个好伙计是波特

translation.en: Very, very magical. Trained at Hogwarts.
translation.zh: ‎非常神奇 在霍格沃茨学习过

translation.en: And meet these little legends. Itsy.
Bitsy. Bitsy. Yeah. Oh!
Teenie. Teenie.
And, oh, this one is Weenie, but be careful about Weenie,
translation.zh: ‎这位是小个子 ‎对小个子要小心

translation.en: 'cause she will "wee wee wee-nie" all the way home.
Okay? Won't you, little one? Yes, you will.
translation.zh: ‎好吗？是吧 小家伙？对 没错

translation.en: See what I mean?
-[Beano] Wanna meet Jingle? -Yes.
-Ta-da! It's Jingle! -[kids] Aww!
Why has he got bells around his neck?
So if he wanders off, we can hear him. He's only a baby sheep.
translation.zh:
‎如果它走丢了 我们就能听到
‎它还是只小羊

translation.en: -[lamb bleats] -Hello, Jingle!
[all] Hello, Jingle!
That's amazing! Hello, pleased to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了！你好 认识你很高兴

translation.en: Hello, milady. Hello, sir.
translation.zh: ‎你好 女士 你好 先生

translation.en: Hello to you, and hello to you too.
You look after Jingle, okay?
Now, these two little ladies, Mary and Bright,
translation.zh: ‎这两位小姑娘 玛丽和布莱特

translation.en: they speak incredible French.
-Ponies don't speak French. -[Beano] Excusez-moi!
translation.zh:
‎-小马才不会说法语
‎-不好意思！

translation.en: Mary. Oui. Bright?
Oui, oui! Au revoir.
Au revoir.
Oh, have you met Rudolph yet?
As in the reindeer?
-Uh, no, as in Rudolph, the Great… -[dog barks]
Oh! …Dane!
Oh. See them sheep there?
They belong to the farm, and Rudolph here is gonna herd them.
translation.zh: ‎它们是农场的 鲁道夫负责放羊

translation.en: So, is Rudolph a sheepdog, then?
Not really, no, but he's trying. Shall we give it a go?
translation.zh:
‎并不是 但它在努力胜任
‎我们试试看吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Right.
Come on, Rudolph. Herd these sheep, boy! Come on, boy!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 鲁道夫 去放羊 去吧 小子！

translation.en: Go on, Rudolph!
♪ Out of all the reindeers ♪
♪ You know you're the mastermind… ♪
[Beano] Good boy.
♪ Run, run, Rudolph… ♪
[Beano] Come on.
♪ Randolph ain't too far behind… ♪
-[Beano] Come-bye! -[kids cheer]
♪ Run, run… ♪
Hi, kids. Where have you been?
We've been talking to the animals with Beano.
translation.zh: ‎我们跟比诺一起聊动物来着

translation.en: That sounds great.
Dad, can we go explore the farm some more?
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 我们可以再去探索农场吗？

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, sure. Let me just try this. -Beano will look after us.
translation.zh:
‎-好 当然 我先试试这个
‎-没事 比诺会照顾我们

translation.en: Okay, no worries. I'll be there in five.
translation.zh: ‎好 没事 我五分钟后到

translation.en: Wait, what? Beano? Who's… who's Beano?
translation.zh: ‎等等 什么？ ‎比诺？比诺是谁？

translation.en: Right, that's… that's not gonna do it.
[grunts] I'm coming, kids!
Okay. Right, okay. Get back! You get back, okay? Stay back, kids!
translation.zh:
‎好吧 退后！你退后
‎别过来 孩子们！

translation.en: Who… who are you?
Please don't shoot.
He hasn't done anything wrong, Dad. He lives here.
translation.zh: ‎他没有做错什么 爸爸 他住在这里

translation.en: -What do you mean? -He lives here. He's the farmhand.
translation.zh:
‎-什么意思？
‎-他住在这里 他是农场工人

translation.en: And animal wangler.
-No, it's actually wrangler. -Why have you even got that, Dad?
translation.zh:
‎-不 其实是牧马人
‎-爸爸 你怎么会有那个？

translation.en: Because I didn't know that Hagrid lived in the barn. Who are you?
translation.zh:
‎我又不知道海格住在谷仓里
‎你是谁？

translation.en: Listen, I'm Beano. I live here. I've worked here my whole life.
translation.zh:
‎我是比诺 我住在这里
‎我这辈子都在这里工作

translation.en: I've been telling your non-identicals about the farm.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚在跟你的异卵双胞胎
‎介绍动物和农场来着

translation.en: Dad, come and meet donkey number one. He's the cutest donkey in the world!
translation.zh:
‎对 爸爸 快来见一号驴
‎它是世界上最可爱的驴子！

translation.en: Okay. Sorry. I just didn't…
I'm sorry about… this. I don't think it works anyway.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉了 反正它大概也不好使

translation.en: [Buster] Dad, you scared Beano!
-That was an accident. -[grunts] And you scared the animals.
Look at Mary! She's done a massive scared pony poo on the floor!
translation.zh: ‎看看玛丽！ ‎它吓得往地上拉了一大坨！向它道歉

translation.en: Say sorry to her.
translation.zh: ‎它吓得往地上拉了一大坨！向它道歉

translation.en: -Sorry, Mary. -In French.
-In? -French.
[groans] Pardon, Mary. Il très, uh, nincompoop.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 玛丽 他是白痴

translation.en: So, you work here?
-Oui. -Do you know anything about plumbing?
Ta-da!
-Wow, he's magic. -Now, this is just a temporary fix, okay?
translation.zh: ‎他会魔法 ‎这只是暂时的办法 好吗？

translation.en: I have to take a proper look at your pipes.
translation.zh: ‎我得好好检查一下你的管道

translation.en: Okay, well, at least I can set up my workstation.
translation.zh: ‎好 至少我可以设置工作间了

translation.en: -Workstation? -[Matt] Yeah.
That's why I'm here, to work on a big pitch.
translation.zh: ‎我就是为此而来 准备一个重要推介

translation.en: -No distractions. -What about your farm work?
translation.zh:
‎-不能分心
‎-那你的农场工作呢？

translation.en: -Isn't that what you do? -I am not the farmer. I am the farmhand.
translation.zh:
‎-那不是你的事吗？
‎-对 但我不是农民 ‎我是农场工人

translation.en: The previous owner, your father, loved this place.
translation.zh: ‎之前的农场主 你父亲 他很喜欢这里

translation.en: -He was proper hands-on. -Was he?
[Beano] He was a local hero.
He saved this place from the clutches of the bad people.
translation.zh: ‎他从坏人的魔掌中拯救了这个地方

translation.en: They were gonna knock it down.
translation.zh: ‎他们本打算拆了它 进行重建

translation.en: These bad people, did they offer any money or anything?
translation.zh: ‎这些坏人 他们给钱了吗？

translation.en: What? Proper cash-a-rooney.
Yeah, but he loved the animals and farm way too much to ever sell it.
translation.zh: ‎但他太喜欢动物和农场了 不愿卖

translation.en: -He sounds awesome. -He was awesome.
You have to admit this place is past its sell-by date.
translation.zh: ‎你得承认 这地方已经过了保质期

translation.en: Nothing works. Even the hens don't work. Have you smelt the eggs? They stink!
translation.zh:
‎什么都不好用 母鸡都是
‎你闻过鸡蛋了吗？是臭的！

translation.en: Yes, 'cause no one's been here. We've been waiting for you,
translation.zh: ‎对 因为一直没人来 我们一直在等你

translation.en: and now you are here, you can help us save the farm.
translation.zh: ‎现在你来了 你可以帮我们拯救农场

translation.en: [Matt] Get off me!
Can we save the farm, Daddy?
translation.zh: ‎我们能拯救农场吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, can we save the farm with Beano?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 爸爸
‎我们能和比诺一起拯救农场吗？

translation.en: No, staying here was just a temporary thing,
translation.zh: ‎不 待在这里只是暂时的

translation.en: and I'm gonna get on with some work.
We need to persuade your dad that this farm is way more important
translation.zh:
‎我们要说服你爸爸
‎这间农场比他的推介

translation.en: than his silly little pitch. Who's with me?
translation.zh: ‎要重要得多 谁要一起来？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Okay. Walk this way.
Dad, you know Mummy would've wanted you to help us save the farm.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 妈妈会希望你帮我们拯救农场

translation.en: You saw how twinkly she was last night.
Okay, I tell you what, I will give you an hour tomorrow morning,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 这样吧
‎明天早上 我给你们一小时

translation.en: and you can show me how this whole farm works.
translation.zh: ‎你们可以向我展示这个农场怎么运作

translation.en: Yes!
Well done, Mr. C.
[Beano] Hello!
Cock-a-doodle-doo! This is your 5 a.m. wake-up call.
translation.zh: ‎咯咯咯！这里是你的早5点叫醒服务

translation.en: Come on, sleepyhead.
-5 a.m.? It's the middle of the night. -Excuse me! Cows don't wait.
translation.zh:
‎-早5点？这才大半夜
‎-不好意思！ ‎牛不等人

translation.en: They've got to be milked, ready or not, and you've got to pick up their poop.
translation.zh:
‎必须得挤奶了 不管你准没准备好
‎你还得给它们挑粪

translation.en: Come on.
Why have I got to do this job? It's awful.
Cows' poop are like golden nuggets. Fertilizes the grass, helps it grow.
translation.zh: ‎牛粪就像金块 ‎可以给草施肥 帮助它生长

translation.en: We love the poop. We worship the poop.
translation.zh: ‎我们喜欢粪 我们崇拜粪

translation.en: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
Hey, you remind me of someone. Have you seen the film The Shining?
translation.zh: ‎你让我想起一个人 ‎你看过电影《闪灵》吗？

translation.en: Here's Beano!
Let's chop some wood.
You need to put your back into it, Farmer Cunningham. Swing it really high.
translation.zh: ‎你得使点劲 坎宁翰农夫 ‎挥得高点

translation.en: Yeah? Try…
Whoa!
-Pretend I'm a big voluptuous pig. -Yeah.
[Beano] Litter. Floor. Pig. Litter.
translation.zh: ‎垃圾 地面 猪 垃圾

translation.en: Ooh! Lollipop!
Dangerous. Put your litter in the bin.
translation.zh: ‎危险 垃圾要放进垃圾桶

translation.en: But most importantly, never ever leave that gate to the far field open,
translation.zh:
‎但最重要的是
‎绝不能忘记关通往野地的门

translation.en: 'cause if that gate is left open, the animals will escape.
translation.zh: ‎因为如果门没关 动物会跑出去

translation.en: If they escape, they will get hurt, and if they get hurt, you will get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎如果它们跑出去 就会受伤 ‎如果它们受伤 你也会受伤

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the cows? -Yeah!
-Yes, you do! Come on. Let's go. -[Matt] Oh.
We've got Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, Miss Trunchbull.
translation.zh:
‎这里有马蒂尔达 帕蒂 哈利 赫敏
‎和特伦博小姐

translation.en: A cow called Miss Trunchbull?
Oh, yes. Nanny McPhee and Susan Boyle.
translation.zh: ‎对 麦克菲保姆和苏珊博伊尔

translation.en: -[cow moos] -How many sheep do you have?
Every time I count them, I fall to sleep, so I never get to the end.
translation.zh: ‎每次我数着数着就睡着了 ‎所以我就没数完过

translation.en: -What do you get paid for doing all this? -All this?
translation.zh:
‎-你做这些能拿多少钱？
‎-这一切吗？

translation.en: I get to live in the barn for free and eat all the produce that we grow,
translation.zh:
‎我可以免费住在谷仓里
‎还能吃我们种的农产品

translation.en: and I mean everything, and you give me money for sweets.
translation.zh: ‎什么都能吃 你再给我钱买糖

translation.en: Obviously, you have to pay for other things, like the vet.
translation.zh: ‎当然 你还得花别的钱 比如兽医

translation.en: -The vet? -[Beano] The vet.
-Someone that looks after animals. -I know.
Why do you pay for a vet? It's a waste of money.
translation.zh: ‎为什么要付钱请兽医？这是浪费钱

translation.en: They're like dentists. Always add a bit extra. A rip-off.
translation.zh:
‎他们就像牙医 总想多收费
‎就是骗钱的

translation.en: -Do you know him? Can you trust him? -I'm a "her" actually.
translation.zh:
‎-你了解他吗？你信任他吗？
‎-其实 我是个“她”

translation.en: And I don't rip anyone off.
-You're the horse lady. -And you're the road hog.
translation.zh:
‎-你是骑马的女人
‎-你是挡路的司机

translation.en: -I won't be staying long, don't worry. -[vet] That's a shame.
translation.zh:
‎-我不会待太久 别担心
‎-真可惜

translation.en: I baked these, but seeing as you're not staying…
translation.zh: ‎这是我烤的 但既然你不久留

translation.en: Give 'em to me!
Sorry, I just love Miss Ashley's cookies.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我好喜欢阿什利小姐的饼干

translation.en: -Chocolate chip? -Triple chocolate chip.
translation.zh:
‎-有巧克力碎片吗？
‎-三倍巧克力片

translation.en: Triple chocolate chip! Arnie! Look what Daddy's got for you.
translation.zh:
‎三倍巧克力片！
‎阿尼！看爸爸给你拿了什么

translation.en: I take it you're acquainted with all the animals here, then?
[Matt] I mean, I'm not really an animal person.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我不是很喜欢动物

translation.en: Well, that's a shame. Mistletoe Farm has some wonderful livestock.
translation.zh: ‎真可惜 ‎槲寄生农场有一些很棒的牲畜

translation.en: -And you're about to get a new addition. -Huh?
-Holly's about to pop. -What?
She's pregnant.
You're kidding! [laughs]
You're kidding.
No, 'cause a kid is a baby goat. It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: ‎不是 玩笑就是小山羊 算了

translation.en: You should prepare yourself because goats often have twins,
translation.zh: ‎你得准备好 因为山羊经常怀双胞胎

translation.en: sometimes triplets.
-Triplets? -[piglet squeals]
Oh, hello, Mr. Weenie! How are you today?
translation.zh: ‎你好 小个子先生 你今天怎么样？

translation.en: Hello, Ashley. Thank you for the cookies. I love you.
translation.zh: ‎你好 阿什利 谢谢你的饼干 我爱你

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay! -Wee, wee, wee.
-It's a present! -Okay. That's… weird.
Listen, it was nice to meet you for a second time.
translation.zh: ‎听着 很高兴第二次见到你

translation.en: Hopefully I don't have to see you again. Oh, no. I just mean the animals are fine.
translation.zh: ‎希望我不必再见到你了 ‎不 我是说 动物都没事

translation.en: I come and check up on them every week.
And if Holly Goat's waters break, give me a call at the surgery.
translation.zh:
‎如果山羊霍莉的羊水破了
‎打电话找我

translation.en: I think we've got it covered.
Yeah.
Ooh. I think there's something brewing, Weenie.
translation.zh: ‎好像有事要发生 小个子

translation.en: -Dad, who was that? -That was the vet.
She's really pretty.
She's really expensive is what she is, Rosie,
and apparently we're having kids, maybe three.
translation.zh:
‎而且 我们还要有小山羊了
‎可能还是三只

translation.en: But you've just met.
No, not me and Miss Ashley. The Holly jolly goat.
translation.zh: ‎不是我和阿什利小姐 是霍莉羊

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, I've give Weenie too many cookies.
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰先生
‎我给小个子喂了太多饼干

translation.en: There's poop everywhere. Take her. I need to clean it.
translation.zh:
‎它拉得到处都是 抱着它
‎我得打扫一下

translation.en: Oh, I'm glad you're back.
We've got a cat, two budgies, a parakeet, a ferret, a rabbit, and Oscar the pig.
translation.zh:
‎我们有一只猫 两只虎皮鹦鹉
‎一只长尾小鹦鹉 一只雪貂 一只兔子 ‎还要小猪奥斯卡

translation.en: Seems to have eaten something that he shouldn't have again.
-So, how did it go over at Mistletoe? -I met the new owner, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: ‎槲寄生那边情况怎么样？ ‎我见到了新农场主 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -Ooh, what's he like? -To be honest, he's a bit…
-Couldn't put it better myself. -[woman laughs]
What's Oscar been up to this time?
He's eaten my dad's underpants again.
-[Beano] Mr. Cunningham! -Oh God!
-You nearly gave me a heart attack! -Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-你差点吓得我心脏病发作！
‎-抱歉

translation.en: Me and the kids have come up with a roster of farm chores,
translation.zh: ‎我和孩子们列出了需要做的农活儿

translation.en: and we put you in charge of Christmas!
Yep. You've got to fix the barn up for the Hoedown Snowdown!
translation.zh:
‎对 你得修好谷仓 迎接瑞雪土风舞 ‎-什么？
‎-每年圣诞节都在谷仓举办

translation.en: -The what? -Happens every Christmas at the barn.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-每年圣诞节都在谷仓举办

translation.en: We snow the place down.
There's mulled wine and barn dancing, cowboy.
translation.zh: ‎端上热红酒 在谷仓里跳舞 牛仔

translation.en: Wait, no. It will not be happening this year.
translation.zh: ‎等等 不 今年就不办了

translation.en: I need to do a pitch on Christmas Eve, and I need quiet.
translation.zh: ‎我平安夜还有个推介 我需要安静

translation.en: No, this will not do.
You have got to find a way to get Christmas into this barn.
translation.zh:
‎你得想办法
‎让圣诞节气氛进入这个谷仓

translation.en: Your father would be very disappointed.
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸要是知道肯定会很失望

translation.en: Listen, you can have your Snowdown Hoedown if you like,
translation.zh:
‎好了 听着 如果你想
‎就去办你的瑞雪土风舞

translation.en: but you're not gonna have it on my farm.
Oh, boy, does your dad get angry.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你们爸爸脾气好大

translation.en: I don't think he likes Christmas anymore.
He even made me leave the Christmas tree at home.
translation.zh: ‎他还让我把圣诞树留在家里

translation.en: We need help, guys, and I know exactly who we need.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要帮助 我知道我们该找谁

translation.en: We need to get your dad into the village to meet the village people.
translation.zh: ‎我们得带你们爸爸去村里见村民

translation.en: -Yes! -Ooh.
This, guys, is Cobbledon.
Post Office. Letters to Santa go there, okay, guys?
translation.zh: ‎邮局 给圣诞老人的信就从这里寄

translation.en: And now I'm gonna take ya to the Cobbledon Arms.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我带你们去柯布顿酒馆

translation.en: Come on, we're clearly not welcome here.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 这里显然不欢迎我们

translation.en: -What's all this? -It's for you!
Beano told us you've come to save Mistletoe Farm.
translation.zh: ‎比诺说 你是来拯救槲寄生的

translation.en: You're our hero!
Come in, come in, let's meet everyone.
This is Perky, the landlord.
Pleasure to meet you, son of Cunningham. Hey, first one's on me.
translation.zh:
‎见到你很高兴 坎宁翰之子
‎第一轮我请

translation.en: This is Ted the butcher, Barry the baker, and Merrick.
translation.zh:
‎这是屠夫泰德 烘焙师巴里 ‎-还有梅里克
‎-我猜猜 烛台制造师吗？

translation.en: Let me guess, the candlestick maker?
translation.zh:
‎-还有梅里克
‎-我猜猜 烛台制造师吗？

translation.en: -How'd you know? -I was joking.
He does! He makes candles.
I'm Otto, the builder.
Anything you need fixing, I'm your man.
translation.zh: ‎你哪里需要修了 就找我

translation.en: And I'm Barney, the postman.
I delivered the inheritance. Told you you'd like it.
translation.zh:
‎是我把遗产送给你的
‎我就说你会喜欢吧

translation.en: -And I'm the town crier! -Hello.
If you pop your head round here, you'll see Happy, Sneezy, Dopey,
translation.zh: ‎这边是开心果 喷嚏精 糊涂蛋

translation.en: and this bundle of joy, Grumpy.
It's what they played in panto last year. They were typecast.
translation.zh:
‎他们去年在哑剧里演了这些角色
‎老实说 就是本色出演

translation.en: My name's Gerald Favor. I'm the director of the Cobbledon Players.
translation.zh:
‎我叫杰拉德费弗
‎我是柯布顿戏剧的导演

translation.en: Did I ever tell you all about that time I did The Mousetrap?
translation.zh:
‎我跟你们讲过
‎我拍《捕鼠计》那次吗？

translation.en: [all] Yes!
And one of my favorites, Miss Bow.
translation.zh: ‎还有我最喜欢的 鲍尔小姐

translation.en: Only because I own the sweet shop.
Who are these little mites?
We have Master Buster, Miss Violet, Miss Rosie, and the twins.
translation.zh:
‎这是巴斯特大人 维奥莱特小姐
‎萝茜小姐 还有双胞胎

translation.en: They don't look like twins. -[both] They're non-identical. -Ah.
translation.zh:
‎-他们看起来不像双胞胎
‎-他们是异卵双胞胎

translation.en: -They're mine. -Where's your mummy?
She died.
-Oh… -Uh, here, have some sweets.
And I knitted you some novelties. Perhaps you'd like to choose one each.
translation.zh:
‎我给你们织了点玩偶
‎你们各选一个吧

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
Hi, I'm Miss Nerris.
Cobbledon Village School. Are these the children joining my class?
translation.zh:
‎柯布顿村学校的
‎这些孩子要来我班上吗？

translation.en: I'm excited about getting them to hang out with children their age.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我很高兴
‎能让他们和同龄的孩子一起玩

translation.en: There's only two children in my class.
There's only two children in the whole school, actually.
translation.zh: ‎其实 全校只有两个孩子

translation.en: You see, we're a very small village with a teeny tiny population.
translation.zh: ‎我们是一座很小的村子 人口也少

translation.en: Forty-seven. Twenty-nine letterboxes.
Fine, as long as they do educational activities.
translation.zh: ‎行 只要他们能接受教育就行

translation.en: Of course. -If I can think of any. -[laughter]
translation.zh: ‎当然 如果我能想到什么的话

translation.en: What I mean is education comes in many forms.
translation.zh: ‎我的意思是 教育有很多形式

translation.en: Does it?
-Yeah. -That is true.
Do you like singing?
-Do you? -You're welcome to join the choir.
Hi, I'm Abel. I organize the welly throwing.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是亚伯 我负责组织丢靴子

translation.en: I'm Aaron, head bell ringer. We practice on a Monday if you're free.
translation.zh:
‎我是亚伦 负责撞钟
‎如果你们有空 我们周一练习

translation.en: I'm Miss Verity. I run the village bookshop and library.
translation.zh:
‎我是瓦莱迪小姐
‎我经营村里的书店和图书馆

translation.en: Pop in any time for a book and a biscuit.
By the way, my name's Miss Womble,
and I've created the knitting circle,
and I knit all the jumpers that you can see here,
translation.zh: ‎你们看到的毛衣都是我织的

translation.en: every single one of them, and the hats,
and we'd be delighted if you'd like to all join in,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们也愿意加入 我们会很高兴

translation.en: and we'd especially like you to join, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: ‎我们特别希望你能加入 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: If you don't know how to knit, we could knit you a jumper.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不会织
‎我们可以给你织件毛衣

translation.en: We could knit your face onto it if you like.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想 我们还可以
‎把你的脸织在上面

translation.en: What do you think?
-He's handsome, isn't he? -Yes.
Listen, I'm not really into all this community stuff.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我不喜欢这些社区活动

translation.en: We were gonna ask you to be the president of the Christmas Association.
translation.zh: ‎我们还想让你当 ‎圣诞协会会长呢

translation.en: Your father always cut down the biggest Christmas tree
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸总会砍一棵最大的圣诞树

translation.en: and donated it to the village square.
We don't have a Christmas tree at the house.
-Not even any Christmas lights. -No Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.zh: ‎圣诞彩灯也没有 ‎槲寄生农场不过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Well, we'll have to see what we can do about that, won't we?
translation.zh: ‎那我们得想想办法了 是吧？

translation.en: Absolutely.
Uh, who fancies a Cobbledon Soda? Yeah. You take a seat. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎谁想来杯柯布顿苏打水？ ‎你去坐吧 来

translation.en: -[Matt exhales] -How's Holly Goat?
Um, I haven't checked on her. I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我没去看它呢 我不知道

translation.en: You haven't checked on your pregnant goat?
translation.zh: ‎你没去看过你怀孕的山羊吗？

translation.en: Well… No, I'm sure she'll be fine.
-I'll check when I get back. -[whimsical music plays]
5,000, and he hasn't paid… Have you paid for anything?
translation.zh: ‎五千 他没付…你付过任何费用吗？

translation.en: Sweets. Sweets? £68 on sweets.
It can't be.
Is it saying "Matt"?
-Hey, Holly. How you doing? -[Holly bleats]
Are you a bit anxious?
My wife was scared when she had our first baby.
translation.zh: ‎我妻子生我们第一个孩子时也很怕

translation.en: I mean, not as scared as me. I was terrified about being a dad.
translation.zh: ‎可没有我怕 我很害怕当爸爸

translation.en: Didn't know if I'd be any good.
Nice to see you talking to the animals, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴你愿和动物说话 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: You know, they understand everything we say,
and we can understand every bleat, moo, bark, oink, if we truly listen.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们用心聆听 ‎也能理解它们的叫声

translation.en: Well, I have listened, understood, and now I'm leaving.
translation.zh: ‎我听了 我理解了 现在我要走了

translation.en: Mr. C, when you were talking to Holly about not being a good enough dad…
translation.zh:
‎C先生 你跟霍莉说
‎担心做不了好爸爸

translation.en: -I think you're going to be a great dad. -"Going to be"?
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得你能成为爸爸
‎-什么叫“能成为”？

translation.en: Me and your popsicle, we were close.
translation.zh: ‎我和你老爸 我们关系很好

translation.en: He let me call him grandpops because he knew he missed out
translation.zh: ‎他让我叫他爷爷 因为他知道

translation.en: on his own kid and grandkids.
translation.zh: ‎他没能陪伴他的孩子和孙子

translation.en: I don't want you missing out too.
I am nothing like my "popsicle," okay?
translation.zh: ‎我跟我“老爸”一点也不像 好吗？

translation.en: I don't think you should be sticking your nose into my family.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你也不该插手我家的事

translation.en: We're family too!
How?
If your popsicle was my grandpops, then you are more or less my dad.
translation.zh:
‎如果你老爸是我爷爷
‎那你差不多是我爸爸

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You're a fully grown man, and you are definitely not my family.
translation.zh: ‎你是个大老爷们 更不是我的家人

translation.en: -Did you put that step there? -No.
-Night, Dad. -[sad music plays]
You literally took the words right out of my mouth.
translation.zh: ‎你真是把我想说的话都说出来了

translation.en: Hey, Buster, what's up?
-I had a bad dream. -Oh, buddy, come here.
translation.zh:
‎-我做了个噩梦
‎-伙计 过来

translation.en: You know bad dreams aren't real.
Do we have to go to school tomorrow?
School is meant to be fun.
But the children might laugh at me.
-Why would anybody laugh at you? -Because I wear sparkly things.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么会有人嘲笑你？
‎-因为我穿闪亮的衣服

translation.en: You know, Buster, there's absolutely nothing wrong
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗 巴斯特 穿闪亮的衣服

translation.en: with wearing sparkly things. Anyone can wear sparkles.
translation.zh: ‎没什么不对 任何人都可以穿亮片

translation.en: Even Fleece?
Definitely Fleece.
Even Mary and Bright?
Yes, ponies love sparkles.
Even you?
Well, I'm not exactly a sparkly kind of person,
but your mum, she used to love anything with glitter and sequins.
translation.zh: ‎但你妈 她以前就喜欢亮片什么的

translation.en: Did she wear a princess crown?
I bet she did when she was your age.
-Shall we go to bed? -Yeah.
Come on, then.
Mary and Bright fed and exercised?
translation.zh: ‎玛丽和布莱特吃饱 锻炼了？

translation.en: -Check! -Check.
-Cows and goats milked? -[both] Check.
Pigs and piglets cleaned?
-Double check. -Double check-a-rooney.
Next job, school.
We don't wanna go to school.
-We wanna stay on the farm with you. -I don't think your dad would like that.
translation.zh:
‎-我们想和你待在农场
‎-你们爸爸不会高兴的

translation.en: -How are we gonna get to school anyway? -Yeah, Dad always gives us a lift.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要怎么去学校？
‎-对 以前都是爸爸送我们

translation.en: Ta-da.
-[Buster] What are they? -Bicycles.
-[Buster] I don't know how to ride. -You don't know how to ride a bike?
translation.zh:
‎-我不会骑
‎-你们不会骑自行车吗？

translation.en: Well, then, you're gonna have to learn. First bikes, then tractors.
translation.zh:
‎那你们得学了
‎先是自行车 然后是拖拉机

translation.en: Get your right leg, put it over the bike.
Look forward, okay? No wobbling.
These are your brakes.
Okay, guys? Very straight. Focus. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 各位？直线向前 专心 走吧

translation.en: Second one, go.
Let's go, go, go! Yes, buddy.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 ‎走！很好 伙计 脚踩脚踏板 对！

translation.en: Feet on the pedals. Yes! You've got it!
translation.zh: ‎走！很好 伙计 脚踩脚踏板 对！ ‎你们做到了！

translation.en: Yes!
-Have you seen the kids? -They've gone to school.
translation.zh:
‎-你看到孩子们了吗？
‎-他们上学去了

translation.en: -What? How? -On their bikes. Like I did.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？怎么去的？
‎-像我当年一样 骑车

translation.en: You went to school?
Yeah. I went to farm school.
-Is that even a thing? -Uh, yes.
Are you sure they're gonna be okay just biking off?
-They don't know the area. -They'll be fine.
translation.zh:
‎-他们又不熟悉这一带
‎-他们会没事的

translation.en: -Where's the school? -In the village.
-Where's the village? -I don't know.
-[Buster] We're lost. -[Violet] It's okay, Buster.
translation.zh:
‎-我们迷路了
‎-我不想迷路 ‎没事的 巴斯特

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm getting the wobbles again!
Dad says to always stay where we are until someone finds us.
translation.zh:
‎爸爸说要待在原地
‎直到有人来找我们

translation.en: There's no one here though.
Yes, there is. Look!
[all] Yoo-hoo! Hello!
Hello, young 'uns.
We're late for school.
The school's only up the road. Come on.
Is there really no Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.zh: ‎槲寄生农场真的不过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Nope, no Christmas.
We're gonna have to help your father bring back Christmas traditions.
translation.zh: ‎我们得帮你们父亲恢复圣诞节传统

translation.en: [Perky] And this is your new school.
There you are, children! Don't worry, I've only just got here.
translation.zh: ‎你们来了 孩子们 别担心 我也刚到

translation.en: Kayla and Kayan are dying to meet you.
Pop your bikes on the floor. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎把自行车停在那边 谢谢你们

translation.en: -In you go. -Break a leg!
Right, come on then. In you go. Sit down at the table.
translation.zh: ‎好 来吧 进去吧 ‎坐下

translation.en: Right, then.
So now we have a big, huge class, we can do so many things.
translation.zh:
‎现在我们班有这么多人了
‎我们可以做很多事

translation.en: We can… make a school choir or put on a big Christmas play.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以…组建校合唱团
‎或排练一出圣诞舞台剧

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
What else do you wanna do?
-We don't really like school. -Especially our old school.
translation.zh: ‎我们不喜欢上学 ‎尤其是我们以前的学校

translation.en: Why not?
I had a lot of friends,
but when Mum died, I got sad, and they called me boring.
translation.zh:
‎但妈妈死后 我很难过
‎他们说我无聊

translation.en: -Oh gosh, that's terrible, isn't it? -[Kayla and Kayan] Yeah.
-What about you, Violet? -I get scared.
translation.zh:
‎-你呢 维奥莱特？
‎-我会害怕

translation.en: Not about anything special. I just get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.zh:
‎也不是因为什么特定的事
‎我就是有时会打颤

translation.en: That's all right. We all get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我们都有打颤的时候

translation.en: Kids used to laugh at me because I wear sparkles.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们会笑我 因为我穿亮片

translation.en: We love sparkles here, don't we?
translation.zh: ‎我们可喜欢亮片了 是吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, they're pretty. -And they're cool.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 亮片很漂亮
‎-而且很酷

translation.en: How about we decorate the school Christmas tree?
translation.zh: ‎我们去装饰学校圣诞树怎么样？

translation.en: -Yes! -[Miss Nerris] Make it sparkly.
Come on, then. Follow me.
That's it. Pop your decorations on.
translation.zh: ‎就这样 把你的装饰放上去

translation.en: -Where'd you get that star, Violet? -I made it for my mum at nursery.
translation.zh:
‎-这星星是哪来的 维奥莱特？
‎-我在托儿所给我妈做的

translation.en: We put it on the tree every year, but there's not a tree at the farmhouse.
translation.zh:
‎我们每年都把它放在树上
‎但农舍里没有树

translation.en: Well, Miss Nerris, maybe we can lend them our tree this year. We don't mind.
translation.zh:
‎那内瑞斯老师 我们今年
‎把我们的树借他们吧 我们不介意

translation.en: I don't think your dad would like it.
I think our dad would be so busy working, he wouldn't even notice.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得爸爸会忙于工作
‎根本不会注意到

translation.en: Really? Well, that's perfect.
We'll take the tree to the farmhouse, and he won't even know we've been.
translation.zh:
‎我们把树搬去农舍
‎他都不会知道我们去过

translation.en: Global? Global, global. Global.
-Marketing. Advantages. -[knocking on door]
Festive gifts and Womble's knits!
-It's Christmas! -Ho-ho-ho!
-Sorry, what? -Where would you like us to start?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 什么？ ‎-你要我们从哪开始？
‎-什么？

translation.en: -[Matt] Start? -We've got to start on the decorations.
translation.zh:
‎-你要我们从哪开始？
‎-什么？ ‎-我们得开始装饰了
‎-好啊

translation.en: -Okay. -No, we'll dress the set.
-Come on, Dame Judi. -See you later.
Oh, Merry Christmas, Mr. Cunningham!
Okay, listen, everyone. Sorry, can I get your attention?
translation.zh: ‎大家听好了 ‎抱歉 可以听我说吗？

translation.en: I really do appreciate the community spirit. I do, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我真的很欣赏这种社区精神
‎真的 好吗？

translation.en: But is there not a time that is more convenient?
translation.zh: ‎但你能在更方便的时间再来吗？

translation.en: Christmas won't wait for convenience.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节不会等到方便的时间

translation.en: The Hoedown Snowdown will not stage itself.
translation.zh: ‎瑞雪土风舞可不会自己安排

translation.en: We are not having the Hoedown Snowdown this year. Not here, not now.
translation.zh:
‎我们今年不办瑞雪土风舞了
‎不能在这里 现在不行

translation.en: Okay? So if everyone can just…
Thank you so much. It's great, but if you can…
That's it, take your hammer. Off you go. Very good. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎没错 拿上锤子 走吧 很好 谢谢

translation.en: All the best. Thank you.
They're only trying to bring Christmas spirit.
I don't need Christmas spirit. I need peace and quiet.
translation.zh:
‎我不需要圣诞气氛
‎我需要平静和安宁

translation.en: No. No. Out! Fine, no. Tell you what. Stay. Make yourself a sandwich.
translation.zh: ‎不 出去！ ‎好吧 那你留下吧 自己做个三明治

translation.en: Make yourself at home.
-Get out of my way. -[donkey brays]
Don't worry, donkey number two. He's just a silly old Grinch.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 二号驴
‎他只是个傻乎乎的格林奇

translation.en: [laughs] I know. -Who wears a tie at a farm? -[knocking]
translation.zh: ‎我知道 谁在农场系领带？

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho. I've got a delivery for you.
-What delivery? -Christmas cards from the villagers.
A lovely one from Miss Womble.
translation.zh:
‎沃博小姐的这件真不错
‎手工编织的 令人赞叹

translation.en: Hand-knitted, impressive. Two lines of poetry in it.
translation.zh:
‎沃博小姐的这件真不错
‎手工编织的 令人赞叹 ‎还写了两行诗

translation.en: -Sorry, are you reading my post? -Only for health and safety.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 你读了我的邮件吗？
‎-只是为了健康和安全

translation.en: Shall I take yours to the sorting office now?
translation.zh: ‎要我把你的贺卡带去分拣室吗？

translation.en: It's Womble, L-E. Not E-L.
You might wanna put a kiss on each card. We usually do, just to be friendly.
translation.zh:
‎你最好亲一下每张贺卡
‎我们都这样 表示友好

translation.en: I'm not putting a kiss.
And talking of Christmas cards, your father used to be so popular,
translation.zh: ‎说到圣诞贺卡 你父亲以前很受欢迎

translation.en: he had hundreds of cards up here round on the walls.
And generous!
He used to put a £10 note in each card
translation.zh: ‎他以前会随每张贺卡附一张10镑钞票

translation.en: with a little note saying, "Have a Cobbledon Brew on me."
translation.zh: ‎还写上“请你喝杯柯布顿啤酒”

translation.en: Did he? Good for him. Right. That's the last one.
translation.zh:
‎是吗？他真好
‎好了 那是最后一张了

translation.en: And you need to go.
I have a very important virtual meeting with a friend of mine starting very soon.
translation.zh:
‎我马上要跟一位朋友
‎开场非常重要的虚拟会议

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
We have real friends round here, Mr. Cunningham, not virtual ones.
translation.zh:
‎我们这里有真实的朋友 坎宁翰先生
‎不是虚拟朋友

translation.en: Virtual friends, I don't know!
Ah, Miss Nerris, seeing as I'm passing, I'll just give you one of those.
translation.zh:
‎内瑞斯老师 既然正好路过
‎我给你一个这个

translation.en: -Lovely. Thank you. -From…
What's this?
We brought it from the school!
-Miss Nerris said we could! -Can we show Kayla and Kayan the animals?
translation.zh: ‎内瑞斯老师说 我们可以哄你开心！ ‎可以让凯拉和卡扬看看动物吗？

translation.en: -Haven't they got to get back to school? -No. Children love animals.
translation.zh:
‎-他们不需要回学校吗？
‎-不 没事 孩子喜欢动物

translation.en: Like I said, Mr. Cunningham, education takes many forms.
translation.zh: ‎我说过 坎宁翰先生 教育有很多形式

translation.en: [Beano] Mr. C! Mr. C!
Farmer Cunningham, it's Holly Goat. Her waters have broken!
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰农夫 是霍莉山羊
‎它的羊水破了！

translation.en: -What? -[Beano] Quick!
Okay, listen, I need you to call Miss Ashley, okay?
translation.zh: ‎听着 给阿什利小姐打电话 好吗？

translation.en: And… Oh, get a discount.
I'm coming!
Hang on!
Miss Ashley's on her way. Do you mind if me and the kids stay and watch?
translation.zh:
‎阿什利小姐这就来
‎我和孩子们可以留下看吗？

translation.en: -This would be very educational. -Please can we see the baby goat get born?
translation.zh:
‎-这会很有教育意义
‎-对 拜托！ ‎我们可以看小山羊出生吗？

translation.en: Stay up there, okay? Stay out the way because this is grown-up stuff.
translation.zh:
‎去上面待着 别碍事
‎因为这是成年人的事

translation.en: Blow out, blow in, blow out, blow in.
translation.zh: ‎吹气 呼气 吹气 呼气

translation.en: You don't blow out, blow in. You breathe in, you breathe out.
translation.zh: ‎不是吹气 是吸气 呼气

translation.en: Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out.
I can't breathe. I'm having a panic attack.
translation.zh: ‎我无法呼吸 我恐慌发作了

translation.en: You're hyperventilating. You need to calm down.
translation.zh: ‎你呼吸过度了 冷静下来

translation.en: No! Please! Come on, sheepy-sheep.
-That's it. I do have somewhere to go. -[bleating]
translation.zh: ‎就这样 我赶着去个地方呢

translation.en: -Yes! -That's… Oh, God! There's a head!
There's a head in a bubble. I can't… I'm gonna…
translation.zh: ‎泡泡里有颗头 我不行 我…

translation.en: No, no. You are not gonna pass out!
This is just Mother Nature taking its course.
Look, I'll just take a… Oh my God. Yeah, that is a bit weird. I'm dizzy!
translation.zh: ‎让我来…天啊 这是挺奇怪 我头晕！

translation.en: Let me help.
Sh, it's all right. It's all right. You're doing really well. Keep pushing.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 ‎你做得很好 继续用力

translation.en: Harder! Keep pushing! Harder! You're doing great! Harder! Keep pushing.
translation.zh: ‎用力点 继续用力！用力点 ‎你做得很好 用力点 继续用力

translation.en: -Violet, you totally smashed it! -Look at what you did!
translation.zh: ‎维奥莱特 你做得好棒！ ‎看看你多了不起！

translation.en: Look what you did.
I got here as fast as I could. How's everything going?
translation.zh: ‎我尽快赶到了 一切都还好吗？

translation.en: -Well, you missed the whole thing. -I wouldn't be so sure.
-She's right. I can see another bubble. -Beano, listen. I don't feel…
translation.zh:
‎-她说得对 那儿还有一个泡泡
‎-比诺 听着 我不太…

translation.en: What are you doing? This is no time to sleep.
translation.zh: ‎你干什么？现在不是睡觉的时候

translation.en: Violet will help you. She delivered the first one.
translation.zh:
‎维奥莱特可以帮你 阿什利小姐
‎她给第一胎接了生

translation.en: -Well done, Violet. -[Violet] Come on, Holly.
translation.zh:
‎-好样的 维奥莱特
‎-来吧 霍莉

translation.en: [Miss Ashley] Ah! I'll just, uh, wrap her up in a towel.
So cute.
-Ooh. Oh! Looks like she's pushing again. -[phone rings]
No, now is not a good time. I can't talk.
translation.zh: ‎不 现在不是时候 我没法说话

translation.en: Fletcher wants an update now!
translation.zh: ‎弗莱彻要你汇报进展 马上！

translation.en: I tried covering for you, but she wants to speak to you.
translation.zh:
‎我给你打掩护了
‎但她坚持要找你谈！

translation.en: -Tell her I'm indisposed. -I tried, but she's insisting!
translation.zh:
‎-告诉她我不舒服
‎-我说了 但她还是坚持！

translation.en: Looks like a breech. I can find the feet. I need you to pull.
translation.zh: ‎似乎是臀位 我能找到脚 我需要你拉

translation.en: -What are you doing, anyway? -I'm trying to deliver a kid.
translation.zh:
‎-你在做什么？
‎-我在给山羊接生

translation.en: -What? -Oh God, Miss Fletcher's calling me.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-天啊 弗莱彻小姐打来了

translation.en: Cunningham! Is that you?
Hi! Miss Fletcher.
It has come to my understanding
that you're in some kind of creative retreat
so as to have no distractions, as it were. Is that right?
That's right!
-That's it! Push! I need you to pull. -[grunts]
-Is that a woman's voice I can hear? -No, it's just a kid.
translation.zh:
‎-那是女人的声音吗？
‎-不 只是山羊

translation.en: Come on, Holly. Push.
Children and business do not mix!
Sorry, Miss Fletcher, you're breaking up. I have to go.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 弗莱彻小姐 你信号不好
‎我得挂了

translation.en: Come on, Holly! Push! I need you to push. Pull.
translation.zh:
‎-加油 霍莉！用力！我需要你用力
‎-你可以的 霍莉

translation.en: -That's it. -[Matt grunts, sighs]
-We did it! -[Miss Ashley] We did it!
Sorry. I didn't… It's just…
-Yeah. -We made a baby!
We made a baby!
Ooh, big daddy!
[chuckles] Look how many babies you've gone and done.
Who's a good daddy? You're a good daddy. Who's a good daddy?
translation.zh:
‎谁是个好爸爸？你是个好爸爸
‎谁是个好爸爸？

translation.en: -[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] No, she's not taking.
I'm afraid you're going to have to hand-rear them.
Take them in for a while.
Miss Holly's exhausted.
Don't worry, they'll be okay.
If you can bottle-feed them, take them to bed, cuddle them,
translation.zh:
‎用奶瓶喂它们 把它们抱到床上
‎抱抱它们

translation.en: keep them warm, sing to them, things you did with your own children.
translation.zh:
‎让它们保暖 给它们唱歌
‎就像对你自己的孩子那样

translation.en: I didn't really do the nursing stuff.
Well, now's your chance.
-[goat bleats] -Okay.
So you did really well, Miss Violet.
translation.zh: ‎你表现得很好 维奥莱特小姐

translation.en: Would you like to come and help me at the surgery?
-[gasps] Yes, please. Can I, Dad? -I don't see why not.
translation.zh:
‎-好啊 可以吗 爸爸？
‎-没什么不可以

translation.en: I know he wants them to be in school, but seeing little Violet there in action
translation.zh:
‎我知道他希望他们上学
‎但刚刚看小维奥莱特的举动

translation.en: makes me think farm school would be better for their confidence.
translation.zh:
‎让我觉得农场学校
‎更能培养他们的自信

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Miss Nerris. That's what I've been trying to tell people.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 内瑞斯老师
‎我一直跟大家这么说

translation.en: Farm school is amazing,
and Farmer Cunningham needs it more than anyone.
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰农夫比任何人都需要去学学

translation.en: And the kids, too, especially Kayla and Kayan.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们也是 尤其是凯拉和卡扬

translation.en: They've been on their own up until now.
Don't worry, Miss Nerris. Beano's got a plan.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 内瑞斯老师 比诺有个计划

translation.en: We've got three baby Christmas goats.
translation.zh: ‎我们有三只圣诞小山羊 对吧？

translation.en: So what about… Snowy?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Star.
-Yeah! -Do you want to name the third?
-Yes. -[Beano] Go on, then!
We want to name it after our mummy.
translation.zh: ‎我们想用妈妈的名字来命名

translation.en: This little dude's a boy.
We don't mind. We want to call it Sarah.
translation.zh: ‎我们不介意 我们要叫它莎拉

translation.en: Welcome, Sarah,
to the family.
-Hello? -[Mo] Yo, she's after your address.
-She wants to know where the farm is! -What?
[Mo] Fletcher! She said she was disappointed with your FaceTime call,
translation.zh:
‎弗莱彻！她说
‎她对你的网络通话感到失望

translation.en: said you were distracted by your kids!
Well, to be honest, it wasn't my kids. It was Holly's.
translation.zh: ‎其实不是我的孩子 是霍莉的

translation.en: [Mo] You were supposed to go to that farm to work, to save our jobs.
translation.zh:
‎你是去那个农场工作的 马特
‎拯救我们的工作

translation.en: The Banda House vultures are circling this deal, bro!
translation.zh: ‎班达事务所 他们盯着这笔交易呢！

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -Somebody at the door.
Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
Just thought that it'd be really nice
translation.zh: ‎我只是觉得如果能让孩子们

translation.en: if the children could spend time with the baby goats?
-[bleating] -Uh, what, today?
Me and the villagers thought it'd be really great
if everyone could take part in their education,
translation.zh:
‎我们认为大家都应该
‎参与到他们的教育中来

translation.en: and today is your turn.
I've already got five children, three kids.
translation.zh: ‎我已经有五个孩子 三只羊了

translation.en: You want to give me two more?
"It'd be so good for them to have children their own age to play with."
translation.zh:
‎“能让他们和同龄的孩子一起玩
‎就太好了”

translation.en: -Isn't that what you said? -Yes. But I didn't mean--
translation.zh:
‎-你不是这么说的吗？
‎-对 但我不是说…

translation.en: Okay, off you pop. Have fun!
translation.zh: ‎好了 去吧 玩得开心！

translation.en: -Enjoy farm school! -Right, who wants to dig up some sprouts?
translation.zh:
‎-在农场学校开心点！
‎-再见 ‎好了 谁想挖芽菜？

translation.en: Yes, come on. Follow me!
Last one to the top of the hill has to peel them too!
translation.zh: ‎最后到山顶的人还要负责削皮

translation.en: You too, Mr. Cunningham!
Come on, Rudolph!
Come on, boy.
-What's going on? -We're having sprouts for lunch.
[laughs] Good luck getting my kids to have sprou-- [Buster] Mm.
translation.zh: ‎你能让我的孩子吃芽菜才怪了

translation.en: Buster, where's your lollipop?
I gave it to Billy Goat. I like sprouts now.
translation.zh: ‎给比利山羊了 我现在喜欢芽菜了

translation.en: -Do you want a sprout? -No. Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
‎-你要来点吗？
‎-不 绝对不要

translation.en: You can't hide in your study forever!
So we need to find a way to draw him out of that boring little study.
translation.zh:
‎我们得想办法
‎把他从那间无聊的书房里引出来

translation.en: -Any ideas? -Why don't you show Dad your tractor?
translation.zh:
‎-有什么想法？
‎-你怎么不带爸爸看拖拉机？

translation.en: Oh yeah! Even Daddy likes tractors.
Yes. Yes, I love it.
It's big. It's bold. It's beautiful!
translation.zh: ‎大动作 大胆 太棒了

translation.en: Come on, follow me.
Let's go!
-Ready? Let's go! Woo-hoo! -[exciting music plays]
Innovation that we can bring to your products and your businesses.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以为您的产品和生意带来创新

translation.en: -We go the extra mile. -[bleep]
-Why is it doing that? The-- -[beeping]
What's that?
It's crashed. Oh my God. Yeah, I know. It's worse than that. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎宕机了 我的天啊 ‎我知道 还有更糟的 好吧

translation.en: What else did I write? I wrote "connections."
Oh, this is a nightmare!
What's that growing on the tree, Beano?
Oh, this?
This is mistletoe. It grows all over the farm.
translation.zh: ‎这是槲寄生 ‎全农场到处都是

translation.en: That's where Mistletoe Farm gets its name. But our mistletoe is magic.
translation.zh: ‎所以农场才叫槲寄生农场 ‎但我们的槲寄生有魔法

translation.en: What do you mean?
Our mistletoe doesn't make people just kiss.
translation.zh: ‎我们的槲寄生不仅让人接吻

translation.en: It makes them fall in love.
Come on! I'll show ya.
Donkey number one, donkey number two, I've seen the way you look at each other.
translation.zh:
‎驴一号 驴二号
‎我看到你们看彼此的眼神了

translation.en: Now it's time to bring some magic to your romance.
translation.zh: ‎现在该给你们的爱情注入一些魔法了

translation.en: Yes!
[chuckles] Love is in the air!
That's what I'm saying. It's an absolute nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎对！ 我就是这个意思
‎真是一场噩梦

translation.en: My computer's crashed. He's left me all these unpaid bills.
translation.zh:
‎我的电脑宕机了
‎他给我留了一堆没付的账单

translation.en: -Hay bills, electricity, gas, water! -I knew this would happen.
translation.zh:
‎-干草费 电费 煤气费 水费
‎-我就知道会这样

translation.en: Your father's left you in trouble.
I know that you said to manage my expectations.
translation.zh: ‎不 我知道你说别抱太高期望

translation.en: We're coming back to London straight away.
Sorry, Mum, can I call you back?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 妈妈 我再打给你 好吗？

translation.en: -Do you want to ride the tractor? -No! I've got tons of work to do!
translation.zh:
‎-你想开拖拉机吗？
‎-不！我还有很多工作要做！

translation.en: -I don't wanna go back to London. -We have to do something.
translation.zh:
‎-我不想回伦敦
‎-我们得做点什么

translation.en: Magic mistletoe. Voilà.
Merry Christmas to you.
-Merry Christmas. -How's it going?
We're trying to help with the bills so he doesn't take them back to London.
translation.zh:
‎我们在帮坎宁翰农夫处理账单
‎这样他就不会带他们回伦敦了

translation.en: No way! You can't go back there! This is your home now.
translation.zh:
‎不行！你们不能回去
‎这里是你们的家了

translation.en: -What's going on? -Their dad wants to take 'em to London.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？
‎-他们的爸爸想带他们回伦敦

translation.en: But you're the future of Cobbledon. All right, let me get one.
translation.zh:
‎但你们是柯布顿的未来
‎好吧 我来买一束

translation.en: Hello, children. I've brought you each a ball of wool and some needles.
translation.zh: ‎你们好 孩子们 ‎来 我给你们都带来了毛球和针

translation.en: You can choose your color. Ooh! The mistletoe.
translation.zh: ‎你自己选颜色吧 ‎哦！槲寄生啊

translation.en: I haven't seen this for a while. I'm gonna have a whole basketful.
translation.zh:
‎我好久没看到这个了
‎我要买一篮子

translation.en: -Oh! -[Miss Womble] Thank you.
-Never know when the magic will happen! -No!
translation.zh: ‎谁知道魔法何时会降临 沃博小姐 ‎是啊！

translation.en: Hello, Otto.
Hey, you want some? It's for a good cause.
Why would I want some? It's not like I want to kiss Miss Nerris.
translation.zh:
‎我要它做什么？
‎我又不想亲内瑞斯老师

translation.en: I've made a contribution.
I'll keep it safe… until you're ready.
translation.zh: ‎我会妥善保管 直到你准备好了

translation.en: I've been ready for years, Otto.
translation.zh: ‎我已经准备好很多年了 奥托

translation.en: Beano, can I get some of that?
translation.zh: ‎比诺 能给我来点槲寄生吗？

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Hello, ladies! [chuckles]
Hello!
[gasps] How are the kids?
Mr. Cunningham's doing really well with them.
He's even named one of them Sarah.
I'll take one of those. You never know when you might need it.
translation.zh: ‎给我一束 谁知道什么时候会需要

translation.en: -[Beano] Yeah. -[whimsical music plays]
Bye.
It's gonna happen! It's gonna happen!
Sorry to disturb you.
I hear you're thinking about going back to the city.
-Where'd you hear that? -The village vine.
-Can you take Snowy? -Sure.
-Come on. -I just need to go boil the kettle.
Get the hot water bottles ready. Come on.
Hey, guys.
I'm gonna keep you nice and warm.
-[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] Good girl.
How are you girls getting on?
-New owner treating you well? Huh? -[donkeys bray]
-[Matt] You're great with the animals. -Thank you. Just did Holly's milk.
translation.zh:
‎-你真的很会跟动物相处
‎-谢谢你 ‎-刚给霍莉挤了奶
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Thank you.
It's easier with Holly's kids than my own.
translation.zh: ‎带霍莉的孩子比带我的孩子轻松多了

translation.en: Must be hard for them losing their mum.
translation.zh: ‎失去妈妈 他们肯定很难过

translation.en: I don't really like to talk about it.
Well, if you ever do want to talk about it,
I'm good with humans too.
-[cell phone rings] -Oh, yeah.
Emergency. It's, uh, Oscar the pig again.
translation.zh: ‎紧急情况 又是小猪奥斯卡

translation.en: -Gotta go! -No, wait.
You dropped something.
Do you think she used the mistletoe?
Doesn't look like it. But if your dad and Miss Ashley did fall in love,
translation.zh: ‎看起来没有 ‎但如果你们爸爸和阿什利小姐相爱了

translation.en: he would definitely want to stay and save the farm.
translation.zh: ‎他肯定会想留在这里 拯救农场

translation.en: -We need to make it happen. -[Charlie] What about Mum?
[Rosie] I think she wants that too.
We need to find a way to get Miss Ashley back here.
translation.zh: ‎我们得想办法让阿什利小姐回来

translation.en: Why don't we ask her for dinner tomorrow?
And pretend that Rudolph's sick and needs help?
translation.zh: ‎假装鲁道夫病了 需要帮助？

translation.en: Won't she be mad if she finds out we're lying?
translation.zh: ‎如果她发现我们撒谎不会生气吗？

translation.en: No, no. She won't find out.
Rudolph is a really good actor. He is well sick.
translation.zh: ‎鲁道夫很会演戏 他病得很重

translation.en: Right, for this smoochy magic to work, we're gonna need way more mistletoe, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好了 为了让这个魔法成功
‎我们需要更多槲寄生 好吗？

translation.en: Let's spread out all over the farm.
Operation Mistletoe, go, go, go! Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎槲寄生行动 开始 我们走！

translation.en: I have had no updates
and no evidence to suggest he has done any work at all.
translation.zh: ‎也没有任何证据 证明他真做了什么

translation.en: If Fletcher Consultants is in trouble,
translation.zh: ‎如果弗莱彻咨询公司真有麻烦了

translation.en: I need to see it with my own eyes.
No, she can't come here.
That's what she said! She's the boss!
translation.zh: ‎她就是这么说的！她可是老板

translation.en: I think she thinks you're hiding.
Just stop her from coming, okay? I am so close to nailing this pitch.
translation.zh:
‎阻止她过来 好吗？
‎我快要搞定推介了

translation.en: You look worried. Why am I talking to a goat? I need to get out!
translation.zh:
‎你担心吗？你似乎很担心
‎我为什么要跟山羊说话？我得出去！

translation.en: Brilliant job! Yes! Let's go, go, go!
-Peekaboo! -Hello there. [laughs awkwardly]
I understand you're having a bit of financial difficulty at the farm.
translation.zh: ‎我得知 槲寄生农场有财务困难

translation.en: Now look, we've got a Christmas show coming up.
I would be more than happy to do a bucket collection.
I really need a singer for the carol concert.
translation.zh: ‎我需要一位歌手加入圣诞颂歌演唱

translation.en: Maybe a little singsong will cheer you up.
translation.zh: ‎也许唱唱歌 能让你开心一点

translation.en: No, I don't sing.
Lily's coming to the library later. You could read with her.
translation.zh:
‎莉莉待会要去图书馆
‎也许你可以跟她一起读点什么

translation.en: Pop into the bakery. Violet's coming in to help with the Christmas cakes.
translation.zh:
‎去趟面包店吧 维奥莱特要来
‎帮忙做圣诞蛋糕

translation.en: No, I'm trying to lose calories, not gain them.
translation.zh: ‎不 我还想减重呢 不是增重

translation.en: We don't count calories in Cobbledon!
translation.zh: ‎柯布顿才不管热量呢 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: Tie it up all over the house,
so when they walk under it, they have to kiss,
translation.zh: ‎他们一旦走在它下面 就必须接吻

translation.en: and then, boom, magic!
I've been meaning to ask about the Christmas tree. You won't let us down!
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰 我一直想问你圣诞树的事
‎我知道你不会让我们失望的！

translation.en: [laughs] Mr. Cunningham, we've got a quote here for a new roof on the barn.
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰先生
‎这是份给谷仓修屋顶的报价单

translation.en: It's in a terrible state, leaking for years.
translation.zh: ‎它的状态很糟 漏雨很多年了

translation.en: It's a bit expensive, but maybe we can all help out.
translation.zh: ‎有点贵 但也许我们都可以帮忙

translation.en: I'm not a charity.
translation.zh:
‎-我又不是做慈善的
‎-但你是家人

translation.en: -But you're family. Cobbledon family. -You're one of the village people now.
translation.zh:
‎-我又不是做慈善的
‎-但你是家人 ‎-柯布顿大家庭的
‎-你现在是村里的人了

translation.en: Always great to see you, and I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: ‎见到你们总是很高兴 回头见了

translation.en: -At the Christmas fair! -Christmas fair.
translation.zh:
‎-圣诞集市上见！
‎-圣诞集市上见

translation.en: -[Miss Womble] That's where we'll see you. -[Miss Verity] See you.
translation.zh:
‎-我们到时再见
‎-好 ‎-再见 坎宁翰先生
‎-圣诞集市见 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: -[Barney] At the Christmas fair! -Okay!
translation.zh:
‎-再见 坎宁翰先生
‎-圣诞集市见 坎宁翰先生！ ‎-好
‎-别错过！

translation.en: -[man] Don't miss it! -[woman] Missing you already!
-Where's my speech? -[Beano] What speech?
The thing I've been writing on paper!
translation.zh: ‎讲稿 推介 我写在纸上的东西

translation.en: -You mean that one? -[Matt] No, no, no! Give me that.
Have you not got a backup on your computer?
Computer's broken. That's why I wrote it on paper.
translation.zh: ‎电脑坏了 所以我才写在纸上

translation.en: Okay. Now I've had another little fiddle with the pipes,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我又修了修你的水管

translation.en: but I think you're gonna need a proper plumber.
translation.zh: ‎但你恐怕得请正经水管工了

translation.en: It's freezing!
Mistletoe Farm. I've got a bit of an emergency.
translation.zh: ‎槲寄生农场 我们有紧急情况

translation.en: Broken water pipe. Yeah, quick as you can. Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎水管坏了 对 尽快来 ‎好 谢谢

translation.en: "Rural Estates. Property Buyers. Cash Offers."
translation.zh: ‎“乡村地产 购买房地产 使用现金”

translation.en: Hello.
Sorry, I haven't got time. I'm waiting for a plumber.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我现在没时间做这个 ‎-我在等水管工
‎-我就是水管工

translation.en: -I am the plumber. -[Matt] You're the baker!
translation.zh:
‎-我在等水管工
‎-我就是水管工 ‎-你不是烘焙师吗！
‎-也是水管工

translation.en: -And plumber. -Come in. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你不是烘焙师吗！
‎-也是水管工 ‎进来 谢谢

translation.en: We're so grateful you came to rescue the farm,
save it from those nasty developers who were sniffing around.
translation.zh:
‎不让它落入那些
‎到处钻营的地产开发商之手

translation.en: Oh, rotten, they were.
Relentless, yeah. They only care about money, money, money.
translation.zh: ‎不管不顾 他们只在乎钱

translation.en: They sound terrible.
They don't care if those animals are carted off to you know where.
translation.zh: ‎他们根本不在乎动物们会被送去哪

translation.en: It'll be Jingle pie, and goat curry for those poor babies.
translation.zh: ‎那些可怜的宝宝只能成为盘中餐了

translation.en: That'll fix it.
You're a lifesaver. Thank you.
-All the best, Mr. Cunningham. Bye-bye. -Bye-bye.
translation.zh:
‎-祝你好运 坎宁翰先生 再见
‎-再见

translation.en: -Thanks again! -[Barry] Bye!
It's okay, Rudolph.
-What's going on? -[Miss Ashley] Rudolph's in pain.
Has he eaten something bad? Has he got a bad stomach?
translation.zh:
‎它吃坏东西了吗？
‎它是肚子不舒服吗？

translation.en: His farts have been really stinky lately, haven't they?
Really stinky.
I can prescribe him some painkillers if he's off his food.
translation.zh:
‎如果他还不吃东西
‎我可以给它开些止痛药

translation.en: -Can Miss Ashley stay for dinner tonight? -Well, not tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-阿什莉小姐今晚能留下吃晚餐吗？
‎-今晚不行

translation.en: It's just I've got all those leftovers from yesterday,
and I need to do my work.
Well, maybe you should look up from your work sometimes, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh:
‎也许你时不时该停下工作
‎抬头看看 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -Do that. Look up. Go on. -[Buster] Yeah, look up, Daddy.
translation.zh:
‎-就这样 抬头看 看吧
‎-是啊 抬头看 爸爸

translation.en: -Look up! -[kids] Up, up, up!
Huh. Who put that there?
I think I'm just gonna go and check up on the goats. Yeah?
I-I think I'm just gonna go and check on Miss Ashley.
Oh, yes, well done, Rudolph.
Bravo, my friend, bravo.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 我的朋友 太棒了

translation.en: You're a star. You're a star, my friend!
translation.zh: ‎你真是个明星 我的朋友！

translation.en: -[Miss Ashley sighs] -[Matt] Hi. Don't worry about Rudolph. He's okay.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨
‎-别担心鲁道夫 它没事

translation.en: -Oh, good. -Prescription for Billy the goat.
Bad tooth.
Someone's been feeding him sweets.
Oh, it's Buster. Lollipops.
Although apparently Buster likes sprouts now.
translation.zh: ‎但巴斯特现在喜欢吃芽菜了

translation.en: Much healthier.
It's obvious they like each other. Why didn't they kiss under the mistletoe?
translation.zh:
‎他们显然喜欢彼此
‎为什么不在槲寄生下接吻？

translation.en: And I think we need to reunite Holly with the kids again. She's much stronger.
translation.zh:
‎我们该让霍莉跟小羊们重聚了
‎它强壮多了

translation.en: Oh. I was enjoying looking after the little ones.
The man who's not really an animal person suddenly finds his heart.
translation.zh: ‎不喜欢动物的人突然有心了

translation.en: I wouldn't go that far.
It's just since my heart broke, I've tried not to use it, you know?
translation.zh: ‎自从我心碎之后 我就尽量不动心

translation.en: -Have a good evening. -Yeah. Yeah, you too.
Don't you think the stars shine brighter in the countryside?
translation.zh: ‎你们不觉得乡下的星星更闪亮吗？

translation.en: Well, there's more sky, so there's more stars.
translation.zh:
‎这里有更广阔的天空
‎所以有更多的星星

translation.en: Makes you feel like you're being watched over, doesn't it?
translation.zh: ‎让人觉得有人在照顾自己 是吧？

translation.en: What do I do?
Should I stay?
Give me a sign.
[Charlie] Hi, Dad.
Charlie, are you knitting? You're meant to be asleep.
translation.zh: ‎查理 你在织毛衣吗？你该睡了

translation.en: I need to get it done, Dad.
-What is it? A present? Is it for me? -It's for Kayla.
translation.zh:
‎是什么？礼物吗？ ‎-是给我的吗？
‎-是给凯拉的

translation.en: -What are these? -They're for the triplets.
Miss Womble knitted them. She's gonna knit one for Jingle.
translation.zh: ‎是沃博小姐织的 她要给叮当织一个

translation.en: Well, they are very lucky little goats.
They're going back into the barn tonight, so these are gonna keep them warm.
translation.zh: ‎他们今晚要回谷仓 这能帮它们保暖

translation.en: There we go. There we go.
Star, come on.
-Let's see if you can latch on. -Go on, Star.
translation.zh:
‎-看你能不能自己喝奶
‎-加油 星星

translation.en: -[Matt] Come on. That's it. -[gasps] [Matt] That's it!
-Yes, she did it. -That's fantastic. Okay. Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎-它做到了
‎-就这样 太棒了 ‎好 去吧

translation.en: Snowy's turn. Go on, Snowy. Go on. Don't be nervous.
translation.zh: ‎该白雪了 ‎去吧 白雪 去吧 别紧张

translation.en: -Come on, Snowy. -That's it. Go on.
translation.zh:
‎-加油 白雪
‎-就这样 加油

translation.en: -That's it. You're doing it, Snowy. -Yeah, he did it!
translation.zh:
‎-就这样 你做到了 白雪
‎-它做到了

translation.en: Yeah!
Okay, Sarah, come on.
Off you go. Go on.
-Go on, Sarah. -Do it for Mum, Sarah.
translation.zh:
‎-去吧 莎拉
‎-为了妈妈 莎拉

translation.en: -[Matt] Go on. -Come on, Sarah. You can do it.
translation.zh:
‎-去吧
‎-加油 莎拉 你可以的

translation.en: [Matt] Come on.
That's right, Sarah.
-That's it. You've nearly got it. -You're nearly there.
translation.zh:
‎-就这样 差不多了
‎-差不多了

translation.en: Sarah!
[Matt] You've done it!
-Sarah, you've done it! -[kids cheer]
You good girl. You're such a good mum.
How about you go back to bed? I'll stay with Holly and the kids all night.
translation.zh:
‎孩子们 你们回去睡吧
‎我今晚留下 陪霍莉和小羊们

translation.en: Well done, Sarah.
I love you.
Love you.
You did really well with them goats.
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰先生 你把小羊照顾得很好

translation.en: -Do you wanna sleep in my hammock? -You just want to sleep in my bed.
translation.zh:
‎-你今晚想睡我的吊床吗？
‎-你是想睡我的床吧

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no.
I'm gonna snuggle down here, nice and cozy like a piglet. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我要像只小猪一样 舒服地窝在这里

translation.en: What was he like?
My dad. I'm wearing his clothes. I don't know anything about him.
translation.zh:
‎我爸 我穿着他的衣服
‎却对他一无所知

translation.en: He was a bit like Arnie the pig.
Like, big and cuddly.
He loved nature, loved animals. He loved the stars too.
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢大自然 也喜欢动物 ‎他还喜欢星星

translation.en: He used to say no matter how dark it got, there was always stars to light the way.
translation.zh:
‎他曾经说 无论天多黑
‎总有星星照亮前路

translation.en: If he was so wonderful, how come he just left me?
translation.zh: ‎如果他那么好 他为什么离开了我？

translation.en: -Different priorities. -Gets a job in America, never looks back.
translation.zh: ‎有别的要事得去做 ‎对 去美国工作 再不会回头

translation.en: -Like I didn't exist. -He loved you though.
He didn't try and find me when he came back.
translation.zh: ‎那他回来后 怎么没来找我？

translation.en: He did. Loads of times.
But the letters always got returned. Hang on.
translation.zh: ‎但他的信总被退回来 ‎等一下

translation.en: Here you go.
What…
But… but this is the wrong address.
We moved after he left.
He didn't know that. He just thought you didn't wanna know him.
translation.zh:
‎他又不知道
‎他只是以为你不想了解他

translation.en: I might not be the best dad in the world, but I would do anything for my children.
translation.zh:
‎我可能不是世界上最好的爸爸
‎但我愿为我的孩子做任何事

translation.en: If these letters had come back to me,
I would've gone to the ends of the earth to find my kids.
translation.zh: ‎我会走到天涯海角找我的孩子

translation.en: He obviously just didn't want to find me.
Good night, Mary. Good night, Bright.
translation.zh: ‎晚安 玛丽 晚安 布莱特

translation.en: -Good night, Billy. -[bleating]
Good night, donkey number one. Good night--
translation.zh: ‎晚安 一号驴 晚安 二号…

translation.en: -Please go to sleep. -Goodnight, Farmer Cunningham.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托 睡吧
‎-晚安 坎宁翰农夫

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. Cunningham.
Come on, sleepyhead.
Come on now. Come on. Me and the kids are going wild swimming. Wanna come?
translation.zh: ‎来吧 来吧 ‎我和孩子们要去游泳 想来吗？

translation.en: -It's brilliant for your circulation. -I've told you. I can't!
translation.zh:
‎-对血液循环很有好处
‎-我说过 我不能去

translation.en: My boss could turn up any day now.
It's the weekend. Bosses don't work weekends.
translation.zh: ‎今天是周末 老板周末不上班

translation.en: We've got lots of activities lined up, and tonight is the Christmas fair.
translation.zh:
‎我们跟村民安排了很多活动
‎今晚是圣诞集市

translation.en: No, she's on the warpath. She wants my blood.
translation.zh: ‎不 她气坏了 她要宰了我

translation.en: Oh, fine, go and stew in your own work juice,
and do not forget that Christmas tree, okay?
translation.zh: ‎别忘了那棵圣诞树 好吗？

translation.en: The village square won't be the same without it. Capisce? Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎没有它 村广场就不一样了
‎知道吗？谢谢

translation.en: What?
Sorry, Popsicle. I guess I'm not the son you wanted me to be,
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 老爸 看来我不是
‎你想要的儿子

translation.en: but you weren't exactly the dad I wanted either.
[Matt] Not you again. You see this?
translation.zh: ‎不 你怎么又来了 看到了吗？

translation.en: This is the answer to all my prayers, and you will be out of my life forever.
translation.zh:
‎这是我一切问题的答案
‎你要永远离开我的生活了

translation.en: Right. Give me that back.
-[Billy bleats] -Let go of it.
-[Billy bleats] -Right. I need…
Right. Come here. Come back. Come back!
Oh, it's lovely! It's lovely and warm. Yes, you're in!
translation.zh: ‎太棒了！ ‎挺暖和的 你们进来了

translation.en: Just give me the leaflet. Come on. We're friends, aren't we? Old friends.
translation.zh:
‎把宣传单给我 ‎来 我们是朋友吧？
‎我们是好朋友

translation.en: Give me that. Yes! Ha ha!
Thought you could outsmart Matt Cunningham? Well, you can't,
translation.zh: ‎我以为你比马特坎宁翰聪明？做梦

translation.en: because these guys…
Hang on. Give that back. Oi, hang on. Give me that back!
translation.zh: ‎等等 还给我 等等 ‎还给我！

translation.en: Right. Give it. Come here!
Give me that! Where's he going? Come here. I've got you! Come here!
translation.zh: ‎给我！ ‎它要去哪里？ ‎过来 我抓到你了！过来！

translation.en: [laughs] And that is how you do it.
Yes?
I need some of your mistletoe, the magic stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我需要点你的槲寄生和魔法

translation.en: -What? -The stuff that makes 'em want to kiss!
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么呢？
‎-让人想接吻的东西！

translation.en: Sorry, I'm in the middle of something. Come back later?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我有事 你回头再来吧？

translation.en: It might be too late. She might've gone off with someone else!
translation.zh:
‎那可能就太迟了
‎她可能跟别人走了！

translation.en: Gone off with… Here. Here. Take this.
Thank you! [laughs gleefully]
Welcome to the Cobbledon Players.
I think it's fair of me to say that my productions here
translation.zh: ‎我觉得可以说 我的作品

translation.en: are really pretty legendary.
Now let's just start off
by getting you to tell me what acting experience you've got. Anybody?
translation.zh:
‎你们先告诉我
‎你们有什么表演经验 有人吗？

translation.en: I was going to be in the Christmas play at school.
translation.zh: ‎我本来要参加学校的圣诞剧

translation.en: I'm afraid "going to be" doesn't quite cut the mustard.
When I was in The Mousetrap…
…what we would always do is we would elongate our words for dramatic effect.
translation.zh:
‎我们说话时会拖长声
‎达到戏剧性的效果

translation.en: We'd also leave great big, long pauses after every three or four words.
translation.zh:
‎而且每说三 四个字
‎我们就会进行很长的停顿

translation.en: Then we'd have lots of double takes.
I'll show you this actually. Listen and learn.
translation.zh: ‎我做给你们看 听着学着

translation.en: I am a genie,
and I live in a lamp.
But look!
Who goes there?
Could it be
Aladdin?
Now let's give you a little go.
I am a genie,
and I live in a lamp.
You see, I didn't believe a word of that.
translation.zh: ‎你瞧 这完全没有说服力

translation.en: Lovely. You will go far.
Gerald, maybe we should focus more on the hoedown this year.
translation.zh:
‎杰拉德 我们今年还是
‎专注于土风舞吧

translation.en: We can teach them how to speak hoedown and line dancing.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以教他们说土话 跳列队舞

translation.en: But my production--
Can take a backseat this year, for the sake of the children.
translation.zh: ‎今年就退居其次吧 为了孩子们

translation.en: You all want to be part of the hoedown, right?
-Yes. -Oh, absolutely!
If you wanna go to the hoedown,
we need to teach you how to walk the walk and talk the talk.
translation.zh: ‎我们得教你们怎么走 怎么说

translation.en: Hit it!
Come on, everybody. Clap your hands. It's the Cobbledon Christmas hoedown.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 大家拍手 ‎这是柯布顿圣诞土风舞

translation.en: Now, y'all need to be hoedown ready for the Cobbledon Hoedown Snowdown.
translation.zh: ‎你们得为柯布顿瑞雪土风舞做好准备

translation.en: -Say Cobbledon. -[all] Cobbledon!
Say Christmas!
Christmas!
-Say Cobbledon Christmas! -Cobbledon Christmas!
translation.zh:
‎-说柯布顿圣诞节！
‎-柯布顿圣诞节！

translation.en: -Say hoedown! -[all] Hoedown!
-Say snowdown! -[all] Snowdown!
-Say yee-haw! -[all] Yee-haw!
-Say ooga-ooga-ooga! -[all] Ooga-ooga-ooga!
-Say buckaroo! -[all] Buckaroo!
Now you're speakin' hoedown too.
♪ And let it snow down, hoedown ♪
♪ Come on in ♪
♪ Everybody's waitin' For the Snowdown to begin ♪
♪ So let it snow down, hoedown ♪
♪ Come on, let's go ♪
♪ Christmas kisses with the mistletoe ♪
♪ And let it snow… ♪
Barney tells us your barn roof needs fixing.
translation.zh:
‎邮政所长巴尼告诉我们
‎你的谷仓屋顶需要修了

translation.en: Happy to take a look, see if we can fix it up.
translation.zh: ‎我很乐意去看看能不能修好

translation.en: There's no point fixing the roof when the barn's gonna get knocked down.
translation.zh: ‎没必要修了 谷仓反正也要拆掉

translation.en: -Knocked down? -That's the phone, the office.
So I've got to…
But thank you for your interest.
