-♪ I really wanna kiss Miss Nerris ♪ -♪ Just go ahead, don't be embarrassed ♪
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想亲内瑞斯老师 ‎来吧 别不好意思

translation.en: ♪ I got the magic mistletoe ♪
♪ Kiss me quick, and you can go 'Cause this ain't my first rodeo ♪
translation.zh:
‎快吻我 然后就走吧
‎这可不是我的第一次

translation.en: ♪ And let it snow ♪
Yee-haw!
Mr. Cunningham's gonna knock the barn down, tear it all down!
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰先生要拆掉谷仓 全部拆掉！

translation.en: "I hope you will make a visit to Mistletoe Farm
at your earliest convenience so that we can make an acceptable deal
translation.zh: ‎越快越好 ‎我们好达成可以接受的交易

translation.en: and I can hand over the property to you for redevelopment
translation.zh:
‎我也可以把这块地交给你们
‎进行再开发

translation.en: as soon as possible."
"Yours sincerely, Mr. Cunningham."
[town crier] Oyez, oyez!
Welcome to the village Christmas fair!
[Miss Womble] He's here with the tree!
Your dad's here, kids. Go! Come on, let's go and see him.
translation.zh: ‎你们爸爸来了 孩子们 走吧！去见他

translation.en: Yes. Quick, quick, quick, quick!
Oyez, oyez!
Now for the main event.
The generous donation of the Christmas tree from Mistletoe Farm!
translation.zh: ‎槲寄生农场慷慨地捐赠圣诞树！

translation.en: ♪ Peace on earth and mercy mild ♪
♪ God and sinners… ♪
♪ Reconciled! ♪
♪ Joyful all ye nations rise ♪
♪ Join the triumph in the skies ♪
♪ Mr. Cunningham's on his way ♪
♪ Got a big tree upon his sleigh ♪
♪ Hey! Hark! the herald angels sing ♪
♪ Glory to the Cunningham's kin ♪
That is not a forest tree.
Hey, that's from our school.
-We gave it to you. -That's our tree.
translation.zh:
‎-是我们给你的
‎-那是我们的树

translation.en: Oyez, oyez.
He is a traitor.
He's selling the farm to the developers!
-What? -No!
[villagers] No!
Okay, I've spoken to the developers.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我是跟开发商谈过了

translation.en: I've made an appointment, and they're going to buy the farm,
translation.zh: ‎我已经预了约 他们要买下农场

translation.en: and there's nothing that any of you can do about it.
Mr. Cunningham, you may have given up on us,
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰先生 你可能放弃了我们

translation.en: but we refuse to give up on you.
[villager] Yes.
And I made that jumper for you with your face on it.
translation.zh: ‎我还给你织了有你脸的毛衣

translation.en: What…
-Is that meant to be me? -It's flattering.
How does this look anything like me?
-I wouldn't put this on a goat! -It wouldn't fit it.
translation.zh:
‎-我都不会让山羊穿
‎-也穿不下

translation.en: They say it takes a village to raise a child, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh:
‎人们说养一个孩子需要一整个村子
‎坎宁翰先生

translation.en: This village is raising yours. The least you can say is thank you.
translation.zh:
‎这个村子在养你的孩子
‎你至少该说句谢谢

translation.en: Yeah.
-Kids, we're going. -I don't want to go!
translation.zh:
‎-孩子们 我们走吧
‎-我不想走！

translation.en: Guys.
I don't wanna go, Dad.
Go and get in the car.
Fine.
We can't just let him sell the farm.
The village without a farm will be like Cobbledon without Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎没有农场的村子
‎就像没有圣诞节的柯布顿

translation.en: I say we stage a protest.
We can appeal to Mr. Cunningham's sensitive side.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以唤起坎宁翰先生敏感的一面

translation.en: He doesn't have a sensitive side from what I can see.
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 他没有敏感的一面

translation.en: You know what they say about killing with kindness.
translation.zh: ‎但这值得一试 人们说 善意是武器

translation.en: Let's show him how really kind we can be.
I don't think he realizes how much he needs us,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他没意识到他有多需要我们

translation.en: and he's gonna be so lonely this Christmas.
♪ Try to imagine A house that's not a home ♪
♪ Try to imagine a Christmas all alone ♪
♪ That's where I'll be since you left me ♪
translation.zh: ‎你离开我之后 我就是如此

translation.en: ♪ My tears could melt the snow ♪
♪ What can I do without you? ♪
♪ I've got no place, no place to go ♪
[all] ♪ It'll be lonely this Christmas ♪
♪ It'll be lonely this Christmas ♪
♪ Lonely and cold ♪
♪ It'll be cold, so cold ♪
♪ This Christmas ♪
Okay, well, thank you. That's very… nice.
♪ You remember last year When we were all so sad? ♪
translation.zh: ‎你可记得去年 我们多么伤心

translation.en: ♪ When we thought the pain Would never ever end ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们以为痛苦永远不会结束

translation.en: ♪ I remember looking at you, Dad ♪
♪ I remember thinking That Christmas is all made for us ♪
translation.zh: ‎我记得我想 圣诞节就是为我们存在

translation.en: ♪ Dad, this is the time of the year That you really, you really need love ♪
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 这是一年中你最需要爱的时候

translation.en: ♪ When it means so very, very much ♪
[all] ♪ It'll be cold, so cold ♪
♪ This Christmas ♪
Okay, thank you, kids. Inside.
translation.zh: ‎好了 谢谢 孩子们 进去吧

translation.en: They were the only ones that could sing in tune.
-Oh! -What?
Meet me in the barn first thing.
We're gonna stop those developers. Make sure you tell the others.
translation.zh:
‎我们要永远阻止那些开发商
‎一定要告诉其他人

translation.en: -[both] Yes. -Yes.
[Beano] Get down.
We've spotted the vehicles.
I repeat, we've spotted the vehicles. Enemy incoming. I repeat, enemy incoming.
translation.zh: ‎我再说一遍 我们看到了车辆 ‎敌人来了 我重复 敌人来了

translation.en: You've got to turn it on, Beano.
Enemies incoming. Get to your positions ASAP.
H-I-J-K-L-M-N-O-P.
-Now! -Now!
Okay. Over and out.
Hello. Ah, you found it okay.
-Mr. Cunningham, hi. -Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
-Marlon. -He's Marlon Morris. I'm Louis.
translation.zh:
‎-我是马龙
‎-他是马龙莫里斯 我是路易

translation.en: -Louis Drake. -That's me.
-Okay. Love the place. It stinks. -It stinks. It reeks. Must be intolerable.
translation.zh:
‎-好 喜欢这地方 臭死了
‎-臭死了 ‎臭死了 一定让人无法忍受

translation.en: -Poor man. -Oh, your nostrils!
-Wanna start in the house? -Let's. Come on, boys.
translation.zh:
‎-要先看看家里吗？
‎-先去家里看看 走 跟我来

translation.en: Good idea. Nice to be back. Love to your papa.
translation.zh: ‎好主意 很高兴再来 向你爸问好

translation.en: Charlie is go. Repeat, Charlie is go.
translation.zh: ‎查理行动 再说一遍 查理行动

translation.en: Cunningham, the contract. We'd love you to just pop your signature there.
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰 合同 请你在这里签名

translation.en: Have a skim. Don't worry about the small print.
translation.zh: ‎浏览一遍吧 细节不重要

translation.en: It's fine. I don't need to read the small print.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我不需要看小字

translation.en: I'm happy to see the back of this place.
Absolutely perfect. Now, listen, before we sign, I'd just…
-I'd love to have another look round. -Yeah. No, fine.
-I can just store it safely over here. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我就把它安全地放在这里
‎-好

translation.en: -[Louis] This is the kitchen? -[Matt] Yep.
Oh gosh!
It's quite a smell, isn't it?
-Trust me. It's just rotten eggs. -That is horrific!
translation.zh: ‎相信我 只是臭鸡蛋而已 ‎太可怕了！

translation.en: It's the poisonous mold from the sewer pit below.
translation.zh:
‎是房子下面下水道里的
‎有毒霉菌的气味

translation.en: -What? -What did you say?
-Didn't you tell them about the sewer pit? -No!
translation.zh:
‎-你没跟他们说下水道的事吗？
‎-没有！

translation.en: There is categorically no sewer pit under the--
-What is this? -It's toxic! Agh!
-[Marlon] What is this? -That is not poisonous.
It's in my eyes!
Look, I am sorry about before. As you can see, it's a spacious bedroom.
translation.zh:
‎之前的事很抱歉
‎如你们所见 这间卧室很宽敞

translation.en: Yeah, no probs. We'll move on.
translation.zh: ‎对 没问题 我们继续

translation.en: -Do you wanna-- -Take some measurements? Love to.
[clears throat] What's this? We've got a… Okay.
-[yells] What is that? -Oh gosh!
-What is that? -A pig.
-Why is there a pig there? -I don't know.
-Who keeps a pig in a wardrobe? -Why is there a pig?
translation.zh:
‎-谁把猪放在衣柜里？
‎-为什么里面有猪？

translation.en: [all] Leave the farm alone! Hey! Leave the farm alone! Hey!
So this is the barn, just up here.
The animals spend most of their time in here.
translation.zh: ‎动物大部分时间都待在这里

translation.en: They absolutely love it.
A lot of the original features up here, which is nice.
translation.zh: ‎谷仓还保持着最初的样子 很不错

translation.en: Well, this is it.
Oh, yeah, it's lovely.
-Let's knock it down. -[Louis] Maybe a boutique hotel.
translation.zh:
‎-我们把它拆掉吧
‎-对 建座高级酒店

translation.en: Well, no, 'cause the anim… It doesn't matter.
-Have a look round, and I'll pop back. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我去周围看看 然后回来
‎-好

translation.en: -Yeah. Okay, fine. -Yeah.
[Louis] Yeah, see ya.
-Drake. -Yeah.
-Animals. -[Louis] Livestock.
-[piglets squeal] -Who's a little pork chop?
-Cute. [yells] -Oh, oh!
Put it… Put it down.
-I can't see! -You're fine. It's fine. A little lamb.
translation.zh:
‎-我看不见了
‎-你没事 ‎看 没事 这里有只小羊

translation.en: Hello, little lamb. Can you say "mint sauce"?
translation.zh: ‎你好 小羊 你能说“薄荷酱”吗？

translation.en: Can you say "medium rare with onion gravy"?
Un, deux, trois!
-[kids giggle] -[Marlon] Drake! Drake!
[all] Leave the farm alone! Hey! Leave the farm alone! Hey!
I mean, so this is everything. There is a wood down there.
translation.zh: ‎这就是一切了 那边有树

translation.en: We have crops over there, some sprouts or something.
translation.zh: ‎那边好像有农作物 芽菜什么的

translation.en: Yeah. I can see ice rink, theme park, retail park. What do you see?
translation.zh:
‎我可以想象改建成溜冰场
‎主题公园 购物中心 你呢？

translation.en: I can't see anything after what we've been through.
translation.zh:
‎我们经受了这么多折磨
‎我什么都看不到了

translation.en: It's been an absolute nightmare.
Come on! Traitor!
And get off of our land, or we'll get you off!
Don't worry. It's just the local yokels, the village people.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 他们只是当地村民

translation.en: We've had worse protesters than this. These are little people with little lives!
translation.zh:
‎我们见过比他们更可怕的抗议者！
‎他们就是没见过世面的小人物

translation.en: -Little people? Hold my coat. -No, no, no, no!
-This land is not for taking! -Don't worry about her.
translation.zh:
‎-这块地你们休想抢走
‎-别担心她

translation.en: -She's the head of the knitting circle. -No surrender!
translation.zh:
‎-她是编织俱乐部的负责人
‎-绝不投降！

translation.en: Charge!
Let's be havin' you!
Barry, what the hell are you playing at?
Trying to do what's best for our community.
-You won't scare them off that easy. -We might not, but they will.
translation.zh:
‎-你们别想轻易把他们吓跑
‎-我们或许做不到 但它们可以

translation.en: Oh my…
Bye-bye!
[kid 1] That's it, get out!
-[kid 2] Faster! -[kid 3] Get them!
-[kid 4] Go on! -[kid 5] Get off our farm!
Yes!
No! Do not sign that, Farmer Cunningham.
I have already signed it. They didn't,
and now they don't want to buy the farm, thanks to you.
translation.zh: ‎现在因为你 他们不想买农场了

translation.en: You can't go back to being all work.
translation.zh: ‎你不能回到只知道工作的日子

translation.en: Real life is not fresh air and talking to chickens, Beano, okay?
translation.zh:
‎现实生活不是新鲜空气和对鸡讲话
‎比诺 好吗？

translation.en: -People's jobs are at stake! -Your kids' happiness is too.
translation.zh:
‎-这事关人们的工作！
‎-还关系到你孩子的幸福

translation.en: -My kids are fine. -They miss their mum.
translation.zh:
‎-我的孩子们没事
‎-他们想念妈妈

translation.en: But they miss their dad more.
This is business, Beano.
Kids don't count!
We don't count?
No, I… Well, it was… I was…
Oh, well, thank you. Thank you very much!
This had better be the best pitch Cunningham has written,
translation.zh: ‎这最好是坎宁翰写过的最好的推介

translation.en: because if it's not, he will be losing a lot more than his job,
translation.zh: ‎否则 他要失去的就不止是工作了

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
-What's that? -[Mo] That's a sheep. You know…
[baas] Them ones.
Ugh! What's that noxious smell?
Oh, it's the countryside air!
[Mo coughs] What are you doing? -[Miss Fletcher] I don't like it! -[ominous music stops]
-Looks like we've seen 'em off! -[villagers cheer]
Oh, maybe I spoke too soon.
There's more of them! They're all coming out of the woodwork!
translation.zh: ‎又来人了 他们都钻出来了！

translation.en: [all] Boo!
Where is he? Where's Matthew? What have you done with him?
translation.zh:
‎他在哪里？马修在哪里？
‎你们把他怎么了？

translation.en: -We don't want you here! We've had enough! -[man] Aye.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不希望你来！我们受够了！
‎-对

translation.en: I have driven all the way from London to here,
translation.zh: ‎我从伦敦一路开车来到这里

translation.en: and I demand to see him now!
We know exactly where you've come from, same place as the last idiots.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道你从哪里来的
‎跟之前那帮蠢货是一处来的

translation.en: -Excuse me? -[Mo] Whoa!
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么？
‎-我们不想惹麻烦 好吗？

translation.en: -We don't want any trouble. -Then you've come to the wrong place.
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么？
‎-我们不想惹麻烦 好吗？ ‎那你们来错地方了

translation.en: -[Miss Fletcher] What's that? -A pig. The ones that… [snorts]
-Them ones. -Yes. Just get rid of it!
-Get rid of it? -Oh, I'll do it myself!
-[Mo] I was gonna try and-- -Don't you dare spray perfume at that pig!
translation.zh:
‎-我还想…
‎-你敢冲那头猪喷香水！

translation.en: Miss Fletcher. Ignore these… yokels and come inside.
translation.zh:
‎弗莱彻小姐
‎别理这些乡巴佬 进屋来吧

translation.en: -Yes, yes. -[gags]
There's no point in buying a farm if you don't like the smell of manure.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不喜欢粪味儿 就别买农场

translation.en: That pig's got more right to be here than you!
translation.zh: ‎那头猪比你有权利待在这里

translation.en: Agh, God, they're multiplying! [yelps]
Get away from me, you filthy swine!
Miss Fletcher, I'm so sorry! Mo, please get her out of the mud.
translation.zh:
‎弗莱彻小姐 我很抱歉！
‎莫 快把她从泥地里拉出来

translation.en: D'you… Do you wanna?
-You're fired. -Please, don't--
You are sacked.
You are dismissed with immediate effect.
I ain't gonna sugarcoat it. You're gone. Now, Mo, heave me up!
translation.zh: ‎我就直说了 ‎你滚吧 现在 莫 把我拉起来！

translation.en: Please! I've been working on the pitch. It's really good!
translation.zh:
‎求你！让我做什么都行
‎我一直在写推介 我写得很好！

translation.en: -[Mo] I like what you've done. -[Matt] I need this job!
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢你对这里的打理
‎-我需要这份工作！莫！

translation.en: -Sorry it didn't work out, yeah? -Mr. Cunningham. I would like a refund.
translation.zh:
‎-很遗憾这事没成
‎-坎宁翰先生 ‎我想退钱

translation.en: -[Matt] What? -My one didn't work!
I don't know what you're talking about!
Oh, Grumpy!
-[Beano] Mr. Cunningham. -Okay, you.
translation.zh:
‎-坎宁翰先生
‎-你 好啊 你

translation.en: You see that woman out there? She's not a developer.
translation.zh:
‎你看到外面那个女人了吗？
‎她不是开发商

translation.en: She's my boss, okay? And now I'm sacked.
translation.zh: ‎她是我老板 现在我被解雇了

translation.en: So that's gone. That job has gone, and it is… It's all your fault.
translation.zh: ‎没了 我的工作没了 这都是你的错

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Mr. Cunningham. -No! You don't get to be sorry right now.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 坎宁翰先生
‎-不！ ‎不 你现在不许道歉 好吗？

translation.en: After everything my kids have been through,
translation.zh: ‎因为我的孩子吃了那么多苦

translation.en: I can't even put a roof over their heads.
-I can fix the roof. -[Matt] Not this roof!
translation.zh:
‎-我可以修屋顶
‎-不是这个屋顶！

translation.en: In our home.
In our real home, with real people, in London where we live,
translation.zh: ‎我们在伦敦真正的家 我们住的地方

translation.en: where I now can't afford to pay the mortgage
'cause I don't have a job!
I'll sort everything.
No, no. You… you have ruined everything.
You know, you need to, um, pack your bags and your hay,
and… and get out!
Okay? Because you… you don't live here anymore.
translation.zh: ‎好吗？因为你不能住在这里了

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you guys.
But I've gotta go.
I've messed up big time, okay? I'm gonna put it right.
translation.zh: ‎我搞砸了 好吗？ ‎我会拨乱反正的

translation.en: We're gonna miss you, Beano.
I don't want you to go, Beano. I don't want you to go.
translation.zh: ‎我不希望你走 比诺 ‎我不希望你走

translation.en: I just brought Kayla and Kayan to say goodbye to the children.
translation.zh: ‎我带凯拉和卡扬来跟孩子们道别

translation.en: -Have you got a minute? -Uh, okay.
The children are really upset, and what you did to Beano…
translation.zh: ‎孩子们很难过 而你对比诺做的事…

translation.en: What I did to Beano.
When I said education comes in many forms, I didn't just mean the children.
translation.zh:
‎当我说教育有很多形式 ‎我不仅是指孩子 坎宁翰先生
‎你也一样

translation.en: -I meant yours too. -Right.
translation.zh:
‎我不仅是指孩子 坎宁翰先生
‎你也一样 ‎好吧

translation.en: Learning is for life, not just for Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎学习是一辈子的事 不是只在圣诞节

translation.en: The children have learnt so many things here.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们在这里学到了很多东西

translation.en: They've learnt to knit, to crochet, to sew, to sing, to have courage,
translation.zh:
‎他们学会了编织 钩针 缝纫
‎唱歌 勇敢

translation.en: and to belong.
But when you took that school Christmas tree
that the children gave you from the bottom of their hearts
translation.zh: ‎那是孩子们真心实意送给你的

translation.en: and presented it back to them as some sort of trick,
translation.zh: ‎你却把它送回来 想骗过大家

translation.en: they felt betrayed.
-That's not what I was trying to do. -You know Violet's star was on that tree?
translation.zh:
‎我不是那个意思 ‎你知道那棵树上
‎有小维奥莱特的星星吗？

translation.en: The one that she made for her mum.
Well, that star got lost in transit,
because you were too busy to do the right thing
translation.zh: ‎就因为你太忙 没空做你该做的

translation.en: and go and cut down that tree in the woods.
Doing the right thing is something we teach children here in Cobbledon.
translation.zh: ‎我们柯布顿教孩子们做该做的事

translation.en: So you may not appreciate our village school or our village ways
translation.zh:
‎你可能不喜欢我们村的学校
‎我们村的传统

translation.en: or our village people,
but we care for your children with all our hearts.
translation.zh: ‎但我们是全心全意地关心你的孩子

translation.en: And so does Beano.
Maybe there's a lesson for you in that.
translation.zh: ‎也许你可以从中学到点什么

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, okay? I am sorry that I threw out Beano, but I…
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我把比诺赶出去了 但…

translation.en: Oh, come on. Look… He's going to be fine, I promise you.
translation.zh: ‎得了 他会没事的 我保证

translation.en: He's from the countryside. The countryside is his home.
translation.zh: ‎他就是乡下人 乡下是他的家

translation.en: This is his home! This is all our homes!
translation.zh: ‎这是他的家！这是我们所有人的家

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever miss the stars? ♪
♪ Do you ever miss the stars? ♪
♪ Do you look up to the dark ♪
♪ And wonder where they are? ♪
♪ Do you ever miss the moon? ♪
♪ And sing her melancholy tune ♪
♪ From years gone by? ♪
♪ Do you ever wonder why? ♪
[Matt] Beano.
♪ …miss the stars? ♪
Hello, son.
[Matt] Mum?
I'm so sorry. I should've told you. I should…
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我应该告诉你的

translation.en: I should've given you the letters and the presents.
Wait. So, you sent everything back to him?
translation.zh: ‎等等 是你把一切都寄回去了？

translation.en: Yes. He'd never turn up at Christmastime.
Your little face waiting. He'd never turn up.
translation.zh: ‎你的小脸 等着他 可他就是不来

translation.en: He was upsetting us all the time. I didn't want any more of that.
translation.zh: ‎他总让我们难过 ‎我不想再这样了

translation.en: ♪ Stars are everywhere ♪
♪ They're lighting up the night ♪
♪ Brave the darkness and… ♪
[Matt] "Dear son, today will be your seventh birthday,
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的儿子 今天是你的七岁生日

translation.en: and I really hope you are happy."
"Dear son, today will be your eighth birthday."
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的儿子 今天是你的八岁生日”

translation.en: "Soon it will be Christmas."
"Today will be your ninth birthday,
and never a day goes by when I don't wonder how you are."
translation.zh: ‎我每一天都在想你过得好不好”

translation.en: "Today will be your 11th birthday,
and I've enclosed a little gift for you as it's so close to Christmas."
translation.zh:
‎我附了 一个小礼物给你
‎因为圣诞节将至”

translation.en: "I thought that you might like this snow globe."
translation.zh: ‎“我觉得你可能会喜欢这个雪景球”

translation.en: "Every time you shake it up, I hope that you will think of me."
translation.zh: ‎“每次你动摇它 希望你会想到我”

translation.en: "Dear Santa, please keep Beano safe, and ask Rudolph to look after him,
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的圣诞老人 请保护好比诺 ‎让鲁道夫照顾他

translation.en: and please get Daddy to change his mind."
[Charlie] "And help us spend time with our dad."
"Help him to stop working so we can show him he can be happy again."
translation.zh:
‎“帮他停止工作 我们好让他知道
‎他可以再次快乐起来”

translation.en: Oh no! The animals have escaped!
Someone left the gate open at the top field!
Something's wrong at Mistletoe Farm. I've got the children on the phone.
translation.zh:
‎槲寄生农场的动物出事了
‎孩子们打来电话 惊慌失措的

translation.en: I'll get the horse, you get the quads.
-Stay as close to me as you can, okay? -[Rosie] Okay!
-[squeals] -Come back!
[Miss Ashley] You left the gate open! Animals have gone onto the road.
translation.zh: ‎你一定是没关门！动物跑到路上了

translation.en: What?
Okay, look, we have to find Beano. He can't have got that far.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们得找到比诺 他应该没走远

translation.en: [strains] Okay, come on. Let's do this.
So you see, Miss Fletcher, none of this was Mr. Cunningham's fault.
translation.zh: ‎弗莱彻小姐 这都不能怪坎宁翰先生

translation.en: Has it stopped talking?
Have we finished? Have we quite finished?
Look. He's worked really hard on his pitch.
translation.zh: ‎听着 他为推介付出了很多努力

translation.en: That's the pitch?
It's not what a pitch looks like on paper but what a pitch has to say that counts.
translation.zh: ‎推介的样子不重要 内容才重要

translation.en: -Would you like me to read it to you? -Go on then. Entertain me!
translation.zh:
‎-要我读给你听吗？
‎-来吧 让我乐乐！

translation.en: Sorry, bit nervous.
Get on with it.
"You're expecting a big, impressive speech."
translation.zh: ‎“我知道你们在期待一番精彩的讲话”

translation.en: Yes, we are.
"But I want you to think about the little guy, like Mo."
translation.zh: ‎“但我想让你们想想小人物 比如莫”

translation.en: Hey!
"At Fletcher Consultants, we always look at the big picture."
translation.zh:
‎“我们弗莱彻咨询公司
‎总是着眼大局”

translation.en: "We are always thinking global,
but sometimes we miss the things that matter most."
translation.zh: ‎但有时 我们会忘记最重要的事”

translation.en: "The people that matter most."
"The butcher."
"The baker."
"The candlestick maker."
"The farmer. The father."
"The cleaner."
"The dreamer."
"The teacher."
"The goat."
"The little people that make up the big picture."
"People like us."
[Beano] Rural Estates. Doesn't look very rural, does it, Rudolph?
translation.zh: ‎我们到了 乡村地产 ‎看起来可不乡村 是吧 鲁道夫？

translation.en: [gasps] Developers. Developers!
-Developers! -Sorry, no change.
translation.zh:
‎开发商啊！ ‎-抱歉 没零钱
‎-不 是我

translation.en: No, no, no, it's me. It's Beano, from Mistletoe Farm.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 没零钱
‎-不 是我 ‎我是比诺 槲寄生农场的

translation.en: -Absolutely not. -No, no, no.
No, sir. Absolutely not.
No, I'm here to sell it. I ju…
Are you joking?
Why would we go back to that treacherous place?
translation.zh: ‎我们为什么要回那个危险的地方？

translation.en: I still smell of egg.
Now, listen, Marlon,
what are you doing here listening to this buffoon
after everything he put us through?
None of that was Mr. Cunningham's fault. It was all my fault, and the kids.
translation.zh: ‎这些都不是坎宁翰先生的错 ‎都是我和孩子们的错

translation.en: We tried to sabotage the farm so you wouldn't buy it.
translation.zh:
‎我们想给农场搞破坏
‎这样你们就不会买了

translation.en: But look, Mr. Cunningham really wants to sell now. He does.
translation.zh:
‎但看啊 坎宁翰先生现在真的很想卖
‎真的

translation.en: He signed here.
All you need to do is sign here and here, and the deal is done.
translation.zh:
‎你只需要在这里和这里签名
‎交易就达成了

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph. Well, here you go. It's all yours.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 鲁道夫 ‎好了 都是你们的了

translation.en: -If we could get the deeds and keys. -Keys, please.
translation.zh:
‎-麻烦把地契和钥匙给我们
‎-钥匙

translation.en: I'm gonna tell the animals you're gonna treat them right.
translation.zh: ‎我去告诉动物 你们会好好待它们

translation.en: Uh, sorry, you… He's just gonna tell the… animals.
-Is he okay? -[Louis hums]
-[Marlon] Mr. B! -Mr. Cunningham!
-Where is everyone? -What?
-[Beano] Where is everyone? -Who?
-[Beano] Itsy! -What?
-What's Itsy? -Weenie!
-[Louis] Who's Weenie? -Mary!
Mary!
Bright! Bright!
Where is everyone? Where is everyone?
translation.zh:
‎-大家都去哪里了？
‎-大家都去哪里了？

translation.en: Beano! Beano!
-Beano! -[villagers] Beano!
-Seen Beano? -[man] No.
Sorry, okay, come on.
[villager] Beano!
There you are. Who are we looking for?
translation.zh: ‎你们在这儿 我们在找谁？

translation.en: -We're looking for Itsy, Bitsy… -Teenie and Weenie?
translation.zh:
‎-我们在找小小 小不点…
‎-小豆丁和小个子？

translation.en: You, Beano! We've been looking for you. Is that my jacket?
translation.zh:
‎你 比诺！我们一直在找你
‎那是我的外套吗？

translation.en: -I'm here now. -What are they doing here?
-We bought the farm! -They've signed the contract.
translation.zh:
‎-我们买下了农场！
‎-他们签合同了

translation.en: You do not have to live in Cobbledon anymore.
translation.zh: ‎你不用再住在柯布顿了 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -The farm belongs to them. -I want to live in Cobbledon!
translation.zh:
‎-农场是他们的了
‎-不 我想住在柯布顿！

translation.en: I want to stay here with my children, and you, and… and Miss Ashley.
translation.zh:
‎我想待在这里 跟我的孩子们
‎还有你 还有阿什利小姐在一起

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Beano!
-What's going on? -[kids] Beano!
-What? -I know, okay? And I…
I don't have time to explain that now.
The animals have all escaped. My bad. I left the gate open.
translation.zh: ‎动物都跑了 怪我 我没关门

translation.en: -You ignored the country code. -Never mind about that!
translation.zh:
‎-你忘了乡下的规矩
‎-别想那个了！

translation.en: We need to find the animals before they get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎我们得在动物受伤前找到它们

translation.en: -Everybody, quiet! -[bells jingle in the distance]
I can hear bells.
Rudolph. Jingle bells, where?
-[barks] -The woods.
-[barks] -To the woods, everyone! The woods!
-Let's go! -[Buster] Quick!
-To… the woods. -To the woods.
Wait a second.
To the woods.
-[Beano] Jingle! -[kids] Jingle!
[Beano] This way. This way, this way.
Jingle!
Everybody, quiet! Quiet!
The bell.
This way. Well done, Rudolph. This way.
translation.zh: ‎这边 好样的 鲁道夫 这边

translation.en: [kid] Jingle!
[villagers] Jingle! Jingle!
Jingle!
Who is Jingle?
Absolutely no idea.
[both] Jingle!
[Miss Womble] Oh, look, it's Jingle!
Jingle. Well done, Rudolph. You found him. Finally you're a real sheep dog!
translation.zh: ‎叮当 好样的 鲁道夫 你找到它了 ‎你终于成了真正的牧羊犬

translation.en: Right, I'm going in.
Mr. Cunningham, hold my legs!
translation.zh: ‎坎宁翰先生 抓住我的腿！

translation.en: Okay, well, everybody, hold on.
[Beano] Ready. Steady, please.
After three. One… two… three!
translation.zh: ‎数到三 一 二 三！

translation.en: -[Matt] Get back. -Catch him, please!
-Yeah! -We've got him!
Well done, Rudolph.
-Who are you? -I'm Matt's mum.
Nana!
[chuckles] Nana! Shall we?
-Right. -Right.
-Uh, sit. -Sit.
-[Louis] Ow! -[Marlon] What? [Louis] Just go on.
All right, Grumpy? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: ‎好啊 爱生气 你怎么在这里？

translation.en: Before I retired, I was a lawyer,
and I represented your father, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: ‎我代理你父亲 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: I'd like to draw your attention to this special clause in the will.
translation.zh: ‎我想请你注意遗嘱中的这个特殊条款

translation.en: -What's a special clause? -Is it a Santa Claus?
translation.zh:
‎-什么是特殊条款？
‎-是圣诞老人吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] This special clause stipulates
that the farm cannot be sold under any circumstances
translation.zh: ‎农场是无论如何都不能卖掉的

translation.en: and is only inherited property
if you stay on the farm and sustain it for the years to come.
translation.zh: ‎如果你能留在农场 并维护它的话

translation.en: I'm afraid the farm is not sold
and never can be, as long as the family want to stay here.
translation.zh:
‎只要这家人想住在这里
‎就永远卖不掉

translation.en: We do want to stay here!
I want to stay here forever!
Perhaps you'd like to look through it yourselves.
Let me see this.
Look at this!
-[Louis laughs] -This is just old-fashioned nonsense.
-[Louis and Marlon laugh] -[Marlon] It's… -It's, uh… -[Louis clears throat]
-Drake. -Yep.
-What? -Yep.
-Okay. -[Louis] Okay.
Well, I hope you know this has been some serious time-wasting.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你知道 这真是浪费时间

translation.en: -And you! -[Louis] And you, you!
You! You, you, you, you.
You owe us for dry cleaning and the hospital bills.
translation.zh: ‎你欠我们的干洗费和医药费

translation.en: Do you have any idea how much pain I was in?
-Would you like me to show you out? -We're going. Keep your stupid farm!
translation.zh: ‎要我带你们出去吗？ ‎我们这就走 你留着你的破农场吧！

translation.en: [Louis] Yeah!
-[Miss Ashley] Out! -[Louis] Stinks!
-The farm is ours! -[cheering]
Oh, we've got the farm! The farm is ours!
translation.zh: ‎我们得到农场了！ ‎农场是我们的了！

translation.en: How are we gonna keep it ours?
I think I know a way to keep the farm. Ask the kids about the magic.
translation.zh:
‎坎宁翰先生
‎我想我知道怎么保住农场 ‎问问孩子们魔法的事

translation.en: He means the mistletoe.
What is it with all this mistletoe business?
It's magic.
Okay. I don't think that mistletoe can be magic, Buster.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 槲寄生可没什么魔法 巴斯特

translation.en: Is that…
Oh. [chuckles] It's the town crier.
For a minute, I thought you were Father Christmas.
I know this is something you might not want to hear,
and it's fine if you can't deal with it right now,
translation.zh: ‎如果你现在无法面对也没关系

translation.en: but I brought you some mistletoe
from the fields back there.
Another Christmas gift
to try and make up for all the Christmases I've missed.
translation.zh: ‎来弥补我错过的所有圣诞节

translation.en: Sorry? What? What?
I know it's a shock.
What? Are… are you saying, um…
Hello, son.
How? I… I mean, you left me the farm in your will.
translation.zh:
‎怎么可能？你在遗嘱里
‎把农场留给了我

translation.en: I left you the farm,
but I never said anything about being dead.
And as you can see, I'm alive and well.
Was everybody in on it?
I just wanted to bring my family back together again. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想让我的家人重聚 ‎对不起

translation.en: Will you take it, son?
It's going to change your life.
Hi, Grandpops.
Buster!
How nice to meet you properly at last.
Big day.
The biggest.
[chuckles] It's crazy. I…
I dunno.
What you do know is that everybody loves you.
Especially me.
I'm a very patient person. I mean… Well, I mean, just…
[Beano] Yee-haw! Welcome to this year's Hoedown Snowdown.
translation.zh: ‎咦哈！ ‎欢迎来到今年的瑞雪土风舞

translation.en: ♪ You get the car, I'll get the bar ♪
♪ Pigs in a party mood ♪
♪ Cobbledon Brew, don't mind if I do To say no would be rude ♪
translation.zh: ‎柯布顿啤酒 我就不客气了 ‎拒绝就太没礼貌了

translation.en: ♪ Put on your suits and your cowboy boots Dance to the country band ♪
translation.zh: ‎穿上西装 穿上牛仔靴 ‎随着乡村乐队跳舞

translation.en: ♪ Get in line, have a good time Take your buddy by the hand ♪
translation.zh: ‎排着队 玩得开心 ‎牵起你伙计的手

translation.en: ♪ And slide out to the left And clap up to the right ♪
♪ And tip your hat And dance into the night ♪
♪ And let it snow down, hoedown ♪
♪ Cobbledon in ♪
♪ Everybody's waitin' For the Snowdown to begin ♪
♪ Let it snow down, hoedown ♪
♪ Come on, let's go ♪
♪ Christmas kisses with the mistletoe ♪
♪ And let it snow ♪
Yee-haw!
♪ Take off your coat, dance with a goat Hoedown's gonna begin… ♪
translation.zh: ‎脱掉你的外套 跟山羊跳舞 ‎（瑞雪土风舞）

translation.en: What are you doing here?
-We bring good news. -What?
-Emblem loved your pitch. -Mm-hm.
How?
Beano came all the way to London and showed us the pitch.
translation.zh:
‎比诺大老远跑来伦敦
‎给我们展示了你的推介

translation.en: -Mo read it, very well I may add. -[Mo] Thank you.
They loved it! They loved the whole community aspect of it.
translation.zh: ‎他们很喜欢！ ‎他们喜欢那个社区理念

translation.en: And there was another word…
-Heart. -Heart.
They loved it. Said it had heart.
So I want you to get yourself suited and booted
translation.zh: ‎所以 我希望你 穿好衣服

translation.en: and get yourself back to London. Get out of this place.
No. I don't really want that job anymore.
translation.zh: ‎不 我不再想做那份工作了

translation.en: But I am glad that you two get to keep yours.
translation.zh: ‎但我很高兴你们还能保住饭碗

translation.en: Surely you're not gonna stay here, are you? [chuckles]
-Yee-haw! Say Cobbledon! -[all] Cobbledon!
-Christmas! -[all] Christmas!
-Cobbledon Christmas! -[all] Cobbledon Christmas!
translation.zh:
‎-柯布顿圣诞节！
‎-柯布顿圣诞节！ ‎-柯布顿圣诞节！
‎-柯布顿圣诞节！

translation.en: -Ooga-ooga-ooga! -Ooga-ooga-ooga.
-Beano! -[all] Beano!
-Say yes, Beano! -[all] Yes, Beano!
translation.zh:
‎-好啊 比诺！
‎-好啊 比诺！

translation.en: -Stage dive! -[all] Stage dive!
You gon' catch me? You gon' catch me, right?
translation.zh: ‎你们会接住我吗？ ‎你们会接住我吗？

translation.en: Here I come!
♪ And let it snow… ♪
Miss Fletcher, it turns out that kids really do count,
translation.zh: ‎弗莱彻小姐 孩子是重要的

translation.en: and I want to spend some time with my kids, and my children
translation.zh: ‎我想陪伴我的羊羔 我的孩子

translation.en: and my farmhand, and a very expensive vet,
translation.zh:
‎我的农场工人
‎还有一位经验丰富的兽医

translation.en: because I am coming out.
I'm coming out as a farmer.
That's right. I am now one of the village people.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我现在是村里的人了

translation.en: -Oh, wow. -And nothing is gonna stop me!
translation.zh:
‎-哇
‎-什么也阻止不了我 ‎（我是村里人）

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Cunningham is now one of the village people.
translation.zh:
‎女士们先生们
‎坎宁翰先生现在是村里人了

translation.en: Let's show him what us village people can do!
translation.zh: ‎让他看看我们村里人的本事！

translation.en: ♪ Young man There's no need to feel down ♪
♪ I said young man ♪
♪ Pick yourself off the ground ♪
♪ I said young man ♪
♪ 'Cause you're in a new town ♪
♪ There's no need to be unhappy ♪
♪ It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A. ♪
♪ It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A. ♪
♪ They have everything For young men to enjoy ♪
translation.zh: ‎他们拥有一切年轻人喜欢的东西

translation.en: ♪ You can hang out with all the boys ♪
♪ Y.M.C.A. ♪
♪ It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A. ♪
♪ You can get yourself clean You can have a good meal ♪
translation.zh: ‎你可以恢复健康 ‎你可以好好吃顿饭

translation.en: ♪ You can do whatever you feel ♪
Follow me! The baby donkey's being born!
translation.zh: ‎跟我来 小驴子要出生了！

translation.en: [whispering] Follow me. Sh.
So donkey number one and donkey number two
made donkey number three.
♪ Silent night ♪
♪ Holy night ♪
♪ Donkey born ♪
♪ Soft and bright ♪
♪ Hear the angels ♪
♪ On Mistletoe Farm ♪
♪ Lovely donkey will come to no harm ♪
[Beano and Matt] ♪ Down on Mistletoe Farm ♪
♪ Down on Mistletoe Farm ♪
♪ Silent night ♪
[villagers] ♪ Silent night ♪
[Beano] ♪ Holy night ♪
[villagers] ♪ Holy night ♪
[all] ♪ All is calm, all is bright ♪
♪ Round yon Virgin, Mother and Child ♪
♪ Holy infant so tender and mild ♪
♪ Sleep ♪

♪ Sleep ♪
